1341111121.content:
Tsunade leaned back in her chair. "Ah, so refreshing! So much chakra! Who's a good little chakra battery, eh brat?" she smirked.

Naruto was panicking. What the hell was going on? Was this going to be his life from now on, condemned to be a piece of clothing and slowly and perpetually drained dry until he was no more?

Ningen! a familiar and dark voice rumbled.

"Kyuubi?" Naruto asked, fairly rhetorically given that he knew. How many other colossal chakra creatures or seperate entities did he have lurking within his mindscape?

Are you going to stand for this? Will you curl up like the snivelling cur I know you are? Or will you grow a backbone and do something? he demanded, a low growl backing up his words.

Naruto pondered "You sound like you know something. I'm not gonna just go out like this, and I sure as hell know you're not gonna just take this shit! So, plan...you got one?

Kyuubi grinned, his massive elongated teeth gleeming in the dimmed light. Here is my plan, ningen

The more Naruto listened, the more he grinned. The grin of a man on the cusp of a plan that would turn the tables on someone so very poetically.

"Sounds like a plan, Kyuubi!" he said, thoroughly ready to raise hell.

There was a brief pause.

Kurama

Naruto started, and turned to face the once monolithic entity. "Huh?" he asked, eloquent as always.

The Kyuubi groaned. Kurama...that is my true name

Naruto stared for a moment then, much to Kurama's surprise, took his claw in his hand and made as if to shake it.

"Nice to meetcha, Kurama-san!" he smiled and, much though he tried to resist it, Kurama found himself returning a similar one.

"So....let's do this!" he shouted, fading from the mindscape. As such, he missed Kurama's parting shot.

A human caring about a bijuu...imagine such an absurd concept!



In the meantime Tsunade was leaning back in her chair, about to try and sneak a quick sake before Shizune returned from her task. She found herself whimpering as her arm seemed to freeze mere inches away from her mouth. She puckered her lips as if trying to syphon the sake over the distance to her mouth. Suddenly, her body was thust back into the chair and she found herself writhing, almost as if convulsing yet she was fully aware of what was happening around her.

"Wh-Wh-What is this?! What's going on?!" she asked, gripped with uncertainty.

She froze when she heard a familiar voice inside her head.

So thought, you'd just get rid of me eh? Well, that's sure as hell not the way this is gonna go down. You tried to betray me Baa-chan, so now I'm gonna turn the tables! came the obnoxious reply.

Her body began to tense again, jerking slightly as she tried to make sense of this. Her strength still showed, as she was crushing the arm-rests of her chair.

'What...is...this?' she thought, now firmly in the grip of terror. She could feel something pushing through her, almost as if coursing through her veins, a vague feeling of something crawling across her mind. She tried to scream out, cry out for anyone to help her. But it was in vain. Her mouth would no longer respond to her commands, no longer give voice to her anguish.

As the last vestiges of her body succumbed to it's new commander and refused to heed her command. As the shadow passed over and coated the last bastions of her mind, her personality, her soul, she felt a pulling sensation and then...darkness.

'Is this...the end for me?' she wondered...there didn't seem to be any sound or light wherever she was. As if to disprove her thoughts, she heard a dripping sound. Suddenly, there was at least a dim light, and a corridor and...water?

She followed the corridor until it entered a wide room. Cautiously she entered, trying to figure out what this was. She reached the center of the room, trying to catch her bearings. Out of nowhere, the floor began to shift and from the water errupted metal bars. Before she had time to fully grasp what was happening, the walls had established themselves and a roof dropped into place. Realisation of what was going on came to her, followed by an almost suffocating dread.

"NO!" she cried out, "THIS CAN'T BE HAPPENING!"

Her desperation was interupted by a low, gutteral chortling. Oh, but it is happening, Slug Queen Senju...it is very much real

She turned to face what could possibly only be described as a waking nightmare...she was trapped in the former prison of the Nine-Tailed Fox, and he was on the outside, staring in, gloating at her current predicament. She wept in terror.

Did you really think I would let you betray that young ningen so easily, Slug Queen? he jeered at her. He knows the pain of betrayal, like I have. Now, he will have your body...and you...will waste away within these bars. Maybe, one day, when he has forgiven you and is compassionate enough...he may pay you a visit. But you will die here, make no mistake. The boy does not take kindly to traitors!

With that, the demon disappeared and Tsunade was left to ponder the remainder of her existence...alone...isolated...inside the prison that once held the greatest of the tailed beasts. The irony wasn't lost on her...a Senju sealed the Kyuubi into it's first jinchuuriki, an Uzumaki. Now, the last of the Senju would die an ignominious death, sealed within the same cage her grandfather had sealed the Kyuubi in, sealed within the last Uzumaki loyal to Konoha.



Back in the office, 'Tsunade' relaxed back in her chair, grinning mischeviously and gloating underneath her newly donned apparel...the Hokage hat.

"Not the way I'd thought I'd become Hokage...but, I guess I got there in the end. A neat side-effect that I got all of Tsunade-teme's knowledge and skills as well as my own. Not to mention now having Tsunades, my own and Kurama's chakra to draw from. Can anyone say 'Most Powerful Being in Existence?" 'she' chuckled to herself, idly cupping her left breast and pondering the fun of the absurd situation she now found herself in. "What do you think Kurama-san? Fun times ahead?"

He heard a rumbling chortle. Indeed, brat. Out of all the hosts I've ever been sealed into, you just might be the most fun. Who could have predicted such an outcome?

Blowing a kiss to her reflection, Ino sat comfortably at her vanity table in only her white satin lingerie, appreciating the subtle allure her new baby pink lips had given her look. Her similarly glossed nails were already dry, and Ino was almost too anxious to sit still when she thought about watching everyone's reactions.

Too slow, Sakura! Now everyone's gonna see that Ino Yamanaka's a mature woman like Lady Tsunade, and you're still the village 'girl'. Assured of Sakura's burning jealousy at this preemptive strike, she wanted to practice her gloating early and get it down perfectly. Don't worry, though, Haruno! When every boy in Konoha is trailing after me, I'll at least let you keep Naruto. Her heated victory speech finally spilled out into the previously silent room as she slammed her fist down, pointed to Naruto's reflection in the mirror and cried, "Pretty generous of me, eh pipsqueak?!"

Wait...

Frozen in the mirror, with what looked to be an equally shocked reaction to her own, was the last boy she ever expected to see in her room- Naruto Uzumaki, unbearable prankster and overall nuisance when he wasn't acting a hero. She wanted to shriek, but was left dumbfounded when Naruto himself beat her to the punch, flailing his hands and eww-ing as if she were the unexpected intruder.

"What are you doing here, you pervert?!" Fury won out over embarrassment as Ino jumped from the seat and marched forward with an accusing finger. Unfortunately Naruto caught her off guard again when, with an incredulous glare that wouldn't look out of place on Ino's own face, he daintily placed a bent wrist on his hip, leaned in, and pointed his finger right back.

"Umm, earth to Ino, I need to borrow some clothes! I live here, too, ya know? I'm sorry you're not modest, but come on, don't you see anything wrong here?" Gesturing down at his usual outfit as if it were obvious, Ino was speechless before the crazy boy, who just tapped his foot impatiently. "Look," he groaned, unsheathing the scroll from his pocket, "it's hard to explain, but this thing pranked me somehow and I need to look a little less 'ick' before I take it fore Tsunade to check out."

The whole scene had sent Ino stumbling wordless back to her chair by the vanity, her near-nakedness forgotten, though Naruto barely seemed to notice it anyway. The girly posture, the way he spoke, asking for clothes like a younger sister might. That scroll. It had pranked him, alright, and she was the punchline. While Naruto sat cross-legged on her bed, fussing with his hair, she massaged her temples in hopes it would churn up an idea.

A glint shone in her eye a moment later, as she considered what she could do, and what she could get away with...

choices: He Arrives at the Inuzuka Compound
14531122.content:
After the strange tingling faded, a confused Naruto mused, “It must be the Scroll. I'd better take a look.” Picking up the scroll, he went off to a more secluded place to try and find out more about the scroll, but Naruto had a sudden compulsion to visit Kiba. “I'll go to the Inuzuka compound. Maybe Kiba can help me figure it out.”

While Naruto walked toward the Compound he started feeling strange. Naruto briefly wondering why he felt wrong wearing clothes, but he shrugged it off as his imagination. “Oh come on, why is my head itching now.” Naruto didn't realize but his hair started turning white. ” He growled at the sensation. “Did I just growl? Last I checked I'm not a dog” He laughed it off. Naruto pulled out the mysterious scroll trying to piece everything together.

It's useless!” An hour wasted deciphering only three words. Beast, mind, and body. “Three words. Out of this entire scroll and I can make out only three words” Frustrated he growled and threw the scroll. This time he failed to notice his growl. After he calmed down, he considered the word Beast and figured it might interest the Inuzuka. “I'm sure Kiba can help.” Naruto starts to feel dizzy and begins to experience new positive feelings toward Kiba, and whines as unusual feelings of regret and sorrow emerge from having fought and insulting him.

He began feel an intense restlessness and began to run toward the compound when it appeared in his sight.
14531122.title: Replace Akamaru

145311221.content:
When he reached his destination he was panting heavily. He felt much hotter than normal. “Why is it so hot.” Naruto felt miserable and he questioned why he decided to wear his jacket. Naruto took off his jacket and shirt exposing his transforming skin.

He sighed in relief, “Much better.” Naruto remembered that needed to see Kiba. When he entered to find his friend he ran into Kiba's mother, Tsume. What are you doing here pup? She asked gruffly. Naruto responded that he needed to see Kiba to look at the scroll. She decided to see for herself, but couldn't decipher it. When she gave it back she told him that Kiba is with his teammates. He couldn't contain the pitiful whine that escaped from his throat.

Tsume looked at Naruto strangely, "hey pup something about you is different, in fact you smell like a ninken." Something in the back of Naruto's told him something was wrong, but when he thought about it his head hurt. He growled in pain as he closed his eyes when he steadied himself. When he opened his eyes they were brown, and his eyesight worsened. Tsume scolds him about messing with unknown scrolls and tells him to take the scroll to Tsunade. Instead of his usual defiance, Naruto lowers his head and whimpers in shame.

As he turns to leave Naruto feels the need to relieve himself. He entered the nearest bathroom, but he shuddered as a feeling of wrongness overtook him. He forced himself to use the toilet even though it disturbed him. Before he left Naruto reflection revealed his now white mohawk, and the fine layer of fur sprouting from his exposed skin..

Naruto snapped out of the trance and he panicked. Naruto shouted, "What's happening, what's the scroll doing to me." When he grabbed the scroll it disintegrated in his hands which had sprouted new claws. In his panic he stumbled into another room.
145311221.title: He Arrives at the Inuzuka Compound

1453112211.content:
"No, I don't want to be a dog. I need to achieve my dream." Naruto realized he was transforming into a dog. He stumbled into someone's room and bashed his nose on the floor. He tried to regain his bearings, but a stabbing sensation in his nose kept him down. To his horror his senses had changed again. He was bombarded with smells he never new existed. There was also a comforting familiarity of this room. His panic was soothed by the sensation. He recognized Kiba's scent and his mind fought between fear out and relaxing. The more Kiba's scent entered his nose, the more he longed to see him. He began to whine and growl as he struggled against these new feelings. He managed to escape as he clung to his remaining humanity.

He managed to escape before he lost himself completely. He knew he lost a piece of his humanity. He wanted to scream and shout, but his voice was replaced by grunts, whines, and growls, no longer capable of human speech. Wait someone's coming in. He heard someone coming. He thought, "please be Kiba." Instead of Kiba, it was his sister Hana. Naruto was disappointed and Hana noticed his expression and asked him,"Are you hungry boy." His sudden hunger pangs left him distracted, so he failed to notice he was served Akamaru's personal dog chow and his usual craving for Ramen disappeared. He dug head first as his teeth sharpened and tongue changed to appreciate the food. He realized he wasn't alone with Hana and spotted the Haimaru triplets and couldn't resist greeting them. His hair had turned into a coat of fur, and he wagged his new tail.

"We missed you Akamaru," they exclaimed. What was stilll human in Naruto's mind finally realized why Kiba's scent filled him with joy. Naruto's fear returned and he took off in an effort to retain what was little was left of his humanity. He planned to flee far from the Inuzuka compound as he could.
1453112211.title: Kiba's Room

choices: Naruto sees his former human self.
14531122111.content:
Naruto tried to escape his transformation. During his panicked state he was subconsciously relying on his new instincts. He dropped to all fours as his skeleton adopted a new shape. His hands and feet changed and twisted growing paws and gaining real claws. His thumbs receded and became dew claws. Naruto's arms and legs followed and his joints took new positions, molding itself into something more suitable for a dog posture. His pelvis rotated forward to lock him into his new quadruped form.

During the change his organs also found their position. While his body was moving his body finished growing its fur, white like the dog he was turning into. When the golden fur was half way up his new calves. His insides settled, but his spine began to shorten and bend, which forced his legs forward, in effect shrinking him. The excess bone from the spine began jutting out of its base, and formed a tail.

When white fur had covered Naruto's body his body shrank to a size appropriate to a puppy. His head finished reforming. His teeth and tongue had changed previously, but they settled into his new muzzle. His facial features moved forward, his lips stretched out and changed color. His nose also became black and wet. His ears changed into triangles at the top of his head. His whisker changed form and became functional.

Naruto Uzumaki finished his physical changes into a canine, but the changes haven't stopped. As he relaxed he realized his complete transformation. He despaired and began to howl. He was lost in his own world until he heard something snap. Wait, he heard a familiar voice and picked up a familiar scent. “Akamaru, I've been looking everywhere for you where did you run of to." Naruto was face-to-face with Kiba. Naruto could no longer fight his feelings of indescribable joy and tackled Kiba, and began to sniff and lick him causing Kiba to laugh. “I'm happy to see you too Akamaru,” Kiba said as he laughed. The name Akamaru resonated in Naruto's mind. It felt more and more right, but a diminishing part of his brain resisted. "Oh, Akamaru, you came back to Kiba-kun", a sweet voice with a pleasant scent said. "Hey Hinata, isn't that Naruto," said Kiba succeeding a eliciting a blush.
14531122111.title: Naruto runs into Kiba

145311221111.content:
Seeing "Naruto" was jarring. It emphasized that reality had changed. "Akamaru" accepted his form had changed, in fact his new form felt natural. "Hey, Dog Breath, I need to talk with you, " shouted the human Naruto. "What do you want fox-face, are you ready to lose to me and Akamaru," Kiba shot back. The former human, who in the past argued with Kiba, was feeling defensive and ready to aid his partner. His last remaining resistance was fading. He was growing more comfortable with his new found role, and his previous terror was fading.

Hinata attempted to dispel the tension quietly said, "Naruto-kun, Kiba-kun please don't fight." They both apologized to her saying they just can't help themselves. "Why are you here, Naruto?", asked Kiba. Oh, granny wants to see us. We have a mission, 'ttebayo. "Akamaru" yipped in excitement. Before he could take off, Kiba lifted him on his head. "Akamaru" felt the familiar comfort that he was near his Kiba. He relaxed and fell asleep.
145311221111.title: Naruto sees his former human self.

1453112211111.content:
"Akamaru" woke up hearing the voice of Team Eight's sensei, Kurenai. "Naruto, from what I know your a hot-hothead. So Shino will be team leader." Naruto accepted but grumbled, "why it always me? What did I do to deserve this treatment. Kiba's not so different" Kurenai heard this and felt some empathy for him and felt she should clarify. "Akamaru" whimpered and felt a human memory rise to the surface. A memory of loneliness. "Kiba has Akamaru to keep him in check." Turning her focus to the ninken she said, "your such a good boy aren't you." The former human felt intense pride at this statement. Of course he had Kiba's well-being in mind.

When he was human he never felt so loved or needed. Kiba trusted him unconditionally. Kurenai appreciated him. Hinata gave him treats and would regularly pet him. Even Shino had no complaints about him. An entire clan loved him. Everyone loved a cute puppy, unlike the foxes container. The last vestige of Naruto thought, "Maybe life as a ninken isn't so bad. I feel so happy with Kiba and the rest of the pack." He closed his eyes as new memories filled his mind. Memories with his greatest friend and partner Kiba.

Akamaru opened his eyes. He was eager to assist his pack to prove his loyalty, and if Kiba needed him to show up the Uzumaki boy and get some payback for the Chuunin Exam he would gladly assist him. He loved his life and couldn't imagine life as human. He loved them, but they were so strange sometimes.
1453112211111.title: Waking Up/Meeting Kurenai

Akamaru lived a full life and went on many adventures with Kiba. His partner had called them missions which seemed rather boring to him.
These days he was content to lounge around the Inuzuka compound. As long as he had Kiba and his pups with him he would be happy. Teasing Kiba about the Hokage position was also quite enjoyable.

His pack had achieved peace and had settled had down with their own mates.

14531221.content:
After a few seconds the tingling stopped. “Weird. I guess I should look over the scroll now.” Naruto said while scratching his head, bewildered at what just happened. Picking up his equipment, he went off to a more secluded place to try and figure out more about the scroll and its strange light. “Hmmm, there is a clearing just north of the Inuzuka compound. Might as well go there.” And so Naruto left.

After a few minutes of running through the village, the young ninja reaches his destination. “Phew, man its hotter than normal out.” Naruto said, wondering why he decided to wear his trademark orange jacket. “Is it getting warmer? Might as well take this thing off.” Naruto took off his jacket and reveled in the cool air. “Much better.” At this point the blond growled at the sensation. “Did I just growl? Man, I've gotta stop hanging around Kiba.” He then laughed off his canine reaction. “Might as well look over this scroll.” Naruto pulled out the mysterious scroll and tried to piece everything together.

“Gaaahh! Nothing, absolutely nothing!” Two hours spent and only a few cryptic words could be interpreted. Beast, mind, and body. “Three words. Out of this whole scroll and only three words are legible.” Frustrated he throws the scroll down and stands up. “Maybe I can get some help from Kiba or his...sister...Hana. Yes, Hana...she would help me.” Naruto starts to feel dizzy, he then sticks his head in a nearby stream to help cool him off. The tingling starts up again.

What happens to Naruto next?
14531221.title: Becoming the Haimaru Triplets

145312211.content:
“Ahh! Man I feel great!” Naruto shouted after pulling his head out of the water with a grin that threatened to split his face in two. Naruto looked around and noticed he was all alone. “No one else is here. So, why not?” Naruto then began to take all of his clothes off. “Ah I feel so free. Better than normal. Now I know what those nudists were talking about.” Naruto thought, remembering when he and Jiraiya ran into a nudist colony when they were looking for Tsunade.

Feeling nature call, Naruto went over to a tree to relieve himself but, not using his two legs like a normal human. No, Naruto got down on all fours like a dog and went over to the tree. He lifted his right leg and did his business. “Mistress...where is mistress Hana?” Naruto thought as he began losing himself to the bestial urges. “We miss her...we miss her scratching our ears, petting us, sharpening our claws. We would gladly wear those collars she made. She is our life. We love her.” At this point Naruto regained his senses for a brief moment.

Horrified at his position he got up and began to look for his clothes. “What the hell is going on? I better get to granny so she can fix this.” Naruto thought until..., “wait a second, Beast, mind, and body. That scroll causing this! I better get to the old bat as soon as possible.” Becoming more and more frightened at what was going on, Naruto did not notice his clothes and the scroll turning into smoke and blowing away. Then the tingling came in again at full force this time, causing Naruto to fall to the ground on all fours while growling and barking at the same time. Slowly his thoughts became more simple, more canine, focusing on one thing, “mistress.”

Next...
145312211.title: Animal Instincts

1453122111.content:
Growling, snarling and clawing at the ground was what Naruto was doing. Gone was his mind, personality, memories; his life experience fading away. Images of running through the fields with Hana, the sweet smell of a perfume Hana wore while she was in the village, how she tasted after licking her in appreciation, they dominated Naruto's mind. “Mis...tress...Ha...na.” These were the only words Naruto could utter before his voice completely failed him.

Trembling, was all Naruto could do at this point, he couldn't get away even if he wanted to. And he doesn't. If the smile on his face is any indication. His hands and feet were the first parts of his body that began to change. Bones started to crack and shift. His thumbs and index fingers began to fuse together. The same thing happened to the ring fingers and pinkies. His middle fingers began to swell. Soon they lost their human shape and became canine appendages, complete with claws. The same happened to his toes, fusing together, shifting, changing. Soon Naruto's arms and legs followed suit, molding itself into something more suitable for a dog's skeletal frame.

The hips were next, slowly rotating to accommodate the new quadruped. Still smiling, he was crying as well. They were not tears of pain, but of happiness, happiness at knowing he will soon be near his mistress. His torso began to morph, it lost its muscular shape, and along with the organs and bones were scrambling to find their new place. While his body was moving, fur began to grow, blond like his hair, and following the route that the other changes took, starting at the feet and moving up.

When the golden fur was half way up his new calves. His insides settled, but his spine began to shorten and bend, which forced his legs forward, in effect shrinking him. The excess bone from the spine began jutting out of its base, and formed a tail.

At this point, the blonde fur has almost covered Naruto's body. His head was the only thing vaguely resembling a human. Vaguely, because he was snarling, growling, and acting like a dog. If anyone was watching this unnatural metamorphosis, they would obviously be shocked at the spectacle of a human head attached to a large dog, like some unholy experiment. The onlookers might be more surprised at the expression on the creature, it was joy, absolute joy. Naruto's thoughts were still focused on Hana and how he would be reunited with her.

The head was the last body part to change. His canines along with the rest of his teeth became visible and sharp. The skull was next. His facial features began to move forward, his lips stretched out, his nose became black and shifted itself. His spiky blond hair began to grow, and when it framed his face, his ears began to shrink only to reappear as triangles at the top of his head. After his ears returned, his hair began to regrow, completely covering his face, even his iconic whisker marks, which along with his pupils dilating and then becoming split completed the look.

Naruto Uzumaki was no longer human. The changes, they have yet to stop.

His fur began to change color, white on the underside, and gray on top. The once blue eyes became golden. But wait, it was the Haimaru triplets, what of the other two?

The tingling soon shifted to his sides, and soon some shapes began to push against the body as if something or things were trying to escape. Two identical creatures emerged and flanked their brother. The three howled in unison. One mind, three bodies. Naruto Uzumaki was gone, only the Haimaru triplets remained.

Soon a familiar smell drifted in accompanied by a familiar voice. “I've been looking everywhere for you thr...” Hana was interrupted when the triplets tackled her and began to sniff and lick her, causing her to laugh. “Geez its like we've separated for years, not a few hours.” Soon the young woman got up, shooing away her companions, much to their dismay. After dusting herself off Hana spoke. “Alright you three let's head home, you still need to put on your collars, and get cleaned up.” The four then left the clearing and went back to the Inuzuka compound. All the while the triplets were consumed with happiness at their life and their mistress.

The End.
1453122111.title: Beyond Lycanthropy.

She growled when he approached afraid of what might happen. Akamaru approached her slowly and she backed away. As a dog she understood what he said when he spoke, "Shiro-chan you don't need to fear me." "No, stop! I don't want to forget my name." "Shiro-chan, why would you forget your name." Sounding distressed she tried to tried to convince herself, "My name is Naruto isn't it? Then why does feel so wrong?"

Her head pounded and she felt her old name fade. Shiro whimpered knowing she lost something that wouldn't come back. Akamaru was there to comfort her. She asked Akamaru, "Why did you follow me?" He told her, "I want to be your mate." The attraction she felt earlier returned in full force. Her body felt hot and she began panting heavily. Her conscious mind retreated and her instincts took over. She no longer saw Akamaru as Kiba's dog, but as a mate. She raised her rear to Akamaru, who wasted no time mounting her. Naruto felt dog saliva cover his arms. His hands morphed in front of his face, fingers shortened and squished together and grew claws, thumbs receding and becoming dew claws. His arms were covered with thick, white fur. Naruto could no longer defend himself and he fell on his back, exposing his abdomen. He felt drool on his belly. Her teeth sharpened and tongue flattened and lengthened, settling within his muzzle. Her lips stretched out and changed color. Her nose became black and wet. His ears changed and flopped to the side of his head. His whisker changed form and became functional.

Naruto Uzumaki finished her physical changes into a canine, She was a pure white Great Pyrenees puppy. The events of the day came crashing down. She despaired and began to howl. She was lost in her own world until she felt her muzzle being licked. "Shh, calm down pup. Mommy is here." Naruto was calmed by the bigger dog. Naruto continued looking around the area. He had felt SOMETHING, like a tingle running through his body. And what had happened to the scroll? It was no where to be seen, all he did was read the words and then that blinding light...

Suddenly, his stomach started rumbling making him remember why he had been walking towards the ninja academy in the first place.

"Nevermind...Food..." He mumbled.

It was in the late afternoon and classes were just getting let out, meaning Iruka-sensei would be finishing up work to go home. After losing a bet with Naruto earlier, Iruka had promised the genin a free meal again, meaning they were going out to eat at the ramen bar tonight. A rare treat to an otherwise rough week. The last few missions he had been on weren't difficult, but they were physically demanding. A cup of some good ramen would be just what the doctor ordered.

~

Not an hour later and Naruto was already slurping down the last noodles in his fourth bowl. He gave a sigh of relief and patted his full belly, leaning back in his chair as Iruka laughed slightly.

"Tough week Naruto?"

"Tough missions...I don't get whats up with them. Back to back, all this grueling manual labor crap. I'm tried of it!"

"We've had this talk before...This is just how the system works, Naruto. The Hokage is distributing the missions based on the necessary skills required to complete them."

"Then why does it feel like we always get the short end of the stick!?"

"The Hokage knows best..."

Naruto stuck his tongue out. "The Hokage this, the Hokage that...I'm so sick of hearing that! I wish I were the Hokage! I'd set things straight!"

Iruka sighed and quietly payed for the bill. Naruto continued to rant all through the night. Though deep down he knew it wasn't Tsunade's fault, he continued to blame her for all his troubles, even on the way to his apartment.

After Iruka left, Naruto quickly took a shower and plopped down on his bed. He had ANOTHER mission tomorrow and needed to get some early shut eye. He had forgotten all about the scroll he had found earlier that day and instead lay awake mentally cursing the Hokage.

"I wish I were the Hokage..." He muttered one last time before passing out.

The next day, he woke up feeling a little different...

Sighing, Sasuke looked down at the growing lumps on his chest. "This injury has really gotten bad," he muttered. "I better bandage myself before the swelling gets any worse."

Sasuke set about wrapping bandaging tape around his upper torso. He struggled to contain the fleshy mounds, and their constant jiggling kept loosening their gauze bindings.

Finally, Sasuke finished binding his chest. He threw his shirt on over his head and walked out to the nurse. He felt rather awkward between the bouncing of his breasts, now a full B-cup, and the swishing of the skirt.

When she saw him, Mariko's smile lit up the room. "You look great, Sasuke-chan! Very cute!"

Normally Sasuke would protest to being called cute, but he was used to girls acting weird around him. Glancing at the clock, the last Uchiha gave a start of surprise. "Sorry, Takeuchi-sensei, I gotta run to school! I'll be late!" He spun and dashed out the door, not bothering to wait for a reply.

Sasuke felt odd the whole run to school. The bumps wouldn't stop wiggling around in their bindings, and something kept brushing against his neck. He reached back and discovered it was his hair. "I'll have to cut that later."

No sooner had the smoke cleared from scroll than Naruto ceased to exist. Sure Naruto's body was still around, unharmed for the moment, but Naruto himself had been destroyed. In his place, now in complete control of the vessel in which it had been sealed for so long was the Kyubi, the infamous nine-tailed fox.

"Finally, I am free," said the fox demon, a noticeable femininity to Naruto's voice. The Kyubi then examined its new body. "So this is what it feels like to be human... and male at that. I guess this will do... for now. First I must let my power grow slowly. If I unleash it now, I might destroy this new body entirely, definitely not a positive idea because I am so weak."

As the Kyubi said this, it began to move through Naruto's apartment, searching for food or something to fill its growling gullet. In typical hunting fashion, the Kyubi got down on all fours, its bare-feet having to squat a little for the Kyubi's hands to feel comfortable. Sniffing in the air, the Kyubi soon discovered Naruto's refrigerator which it opened eagerly. Inside it found a pair of chicken legs, something Naruto was planning to cook for tonight's dinner. Eager for food, the Kyubi grabbed one of the legs and tore into the leg. However, the Kyubi did not know Naruto, much like most humans, had an aversion to raw meat and quickly spit the mouthful it had in its mouth.

"Damn this vessel's taste buds. Even in death he still finds ways of annoying me," said the Kyubi as it brushed off Naurto's pathetic human tongue. It was at this moment the Kyubi had an idea. The vessel in which it now resided was its to do with as it desired. Why not make it a little more homey, at least for a little while. Focusing its power on Naruto's mouth, the Kyubi's power began to change the boy's mouth. Slowly his teeth became more jagged and fang like, great tools for slaughter the weak and defenseless. Naruto's tongue also changed, becoming longer and more accepting of whatever the Kyubi desired to devour. However, also with these changes came pain which forced the Kyubi to stop before Naruto's mouth could be changed beyond his teeth and tongue. "Damn this weak human body," growled the fox demon as it covered its regretfully still human mouth with its hands. "I look forward to the day I discard this shell, but for now these changes will do." Returning to the meat, the Kyubi skinned the meat off both chicken legs.

The fox demon then turned to the other items in the fridge. The Kyubi quickly dined on anything that seemed appealing to it, however after its mild feast, the Kyubi still did not feel satisfied.

1453222222222222222222222222221.title: Naruto changes into Hanabi Hyuuga

145322222222222222222222222222111.content:
It was a lovely day in the Hidden Leaf Village. People were buzzing about. The animals were enjoying the day.

...and Naruto Uzumaki was complaining as usual.

The young ninja had been promised by his sensei, Jiraiya the Toad Sage, that he would take him on a long training trip. However, the old man was nowhere in sight. The reason was because he wouldn't be coming back for 3 months or so, really ticking Naruto off.

"Where's that pervy sage when you need him?" mumbled Naruto as he kicked a can down the street. He had already done some training so he didn't have much to do at all.

"Hmm?" he said as something caught his eye. It was a yellow scroll on the ground, just laying there with no one reading it. Naruto found it odd that no one had it, but finders keepers after all!

"Well, if they don't want it, guess I'll see what it's got!" said Naruto as he picked it up and tried to unravel it. It surprisingly had a tight lock and Naruto really had to try to open it.

"Urgh!" yelled Naruto as he pulled with all he had to open it. Luckily for him, or maybe unlunkily, the scroll finally opened as the force from the event pushed Naruto to the ground.

"Ouch. Well, that hurt" said Naruto as he got up and rubbed his aching head. However, the scroll was now open so he instantly picked up, giving his trademark grin.

"All right, what do we have here?" asked Naruto as he began to read the characters on the scroll. However, instantly, a bright flash erupted from the scroll, slamming Naruto in the chest as he was forced to the ground once again. The scroll feel harmlessly to the ground and layed there, it's power all used up now. It was nothing more than useless paper now.

"Ouch! What is up with today?!" whined Naruto as he got up again and looked at the scroll. He looked at it and felt nothing from it.

"Oh man, what a rip off! Oh well, might as well keep it" said Naruto as he pocketed the scroll. However, his fate was now sealed. The scroll would change him into a random person and he would have to live with being that person's twin for his life.

The person to change into? The young Hyuga heiress: Hanabi Hyuga.
145322222222222222222222222222111.title: The Scroll

1453222222222222222222222222221111.content:
"Hey old man!" yelled Naruto as he entered his favorite restaurant: Ichiraku's. Leaving the issue of the scroll behind, he decided to get himself some ramen, which he pretty much ate for breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacktime, and dessert.

"Ah, my favorite customer! You want your usual?" asked Teuchi, the owner.

"Heck yeah!" said Naruto in agreement. Teuchi and his daugher who ran the store with him, Ayame, got to work on the ramen. However, Ayame took some looks at Naruto and found something odd with him. Naruto was always small for a 13-year old boy but it seemed like he was now even smaller. His clothes still fit him perfectly so she was confused. However, despite that, she decided to have fun with it.

"Hey Naruto, is it me or are you actually getting even smaller?" giggled Ayame, angering Naruto in the process.

"What have I said about making cracks about my height?!" yelled Naruto. He hated being called short by everyone, even though he knew himself that he was short.

"Sorry, couldn't resist" said Ayame, continuing to giggle, which ticked off Naruto more. Soon enough, Naruto's order of extra large ramen was done.

"Nice, time to chow down" said Naruto as he began to dig in. Actually, dig in was more of an understatement. There probably wasn't a word out ther to describe Naruto's eating habits. However, about halfway through, Naruto began to feel odd. It was like he was already full. It was so wierd. He could usually chow down 2 or 3 of these if not more. However, he felt like his stomach couldn't hold much more.

"You ok Naruto? Maybe you ate too fast and got a stomachache?" suggested Ayame, seeing the look on Naruto's face.

"Hmm, maybe that's what it is. Guess I'll take the rest home if you don't mind" said Naruto.

"No problem. Here's a bag to take it home in. Take a good rest. You look like you've trained enough for today" said Ayame. Naruto nodded and packed up his leftovers and left after paying. As he did, it was starting to look like the world was getting a little bigger.

"What's going on?" wondered Naruto. In reality, he was getting even smaller. The reason was that his age was going down. He was currently at 11 years old now, and he was going to go down to 8 eventually.
1453222222222222222222222222221111.title: Lunch Time

14532222222222222222222222222211111.content:
Naruto felt odd as he walked down the roads of the Leaf Village. He felt so wierd as if his insides were changing.

"What's going on?" asked Naruto to himself. He didn't know what the cause of this was but he needed to get some privacy to wait this thing out so others couldn't see what was happening. So, using his ninja skills, Naruto escaped from the main roads and went into the nearby woods where all the training areas were. Luckily, most were empty right now.

"Good, now maybe I can wait this thing out" said Naruto. However, a chilly wind wiped up and caused Naruto to shiver a bit.

"Sheesh, what's up with that? It wasn't cold earlier" said Naruto. Then, he looked at his skin. He felt that it was much smoother than usual and any blemishes he had were almost gone.

"Ok, wierd. This skin kind of feels like Sakura's" commented Naruto. However, as that was happening, Naruto felt as if the world was getting a little bigger again.

"Ok seriously, am I shrinking or something?" asked Naruto. His hand went to his mouth as it sounded younger than normal. There was a nearby lake and went over to it. To his shock, he looked at himself and he looked like an 8-year old.

"What the hell?" yelled Naruto in shock. What was going on?

"Could this be because of that scroll?" wondered Naruto.
14532222222222222222222222222211111.title: Next Change

145322222222222222222222222222111111.content:
Without another thought, Naruto took the scroll out of his pouch and unraveled it again, trying to find something to tip him off as to what was happening.

"Absolutely nothing it seems" said Naruto. However, his eyes widened as he said that and he covered his mouth. That wasn't his voice that came out. It was considerable much higher and more...feminine than before.

"What is happening?" wondered Naruto as the odd voice continued to come out of his mouth. Then, more odd things began to happen as his body suddenly felt a bit weaker than usual. He took off his orange coat and looked underneath his black shirt. His skin was definately smoother and he had no hair at all, not that he had much to begin with. He touched it and it felt really soft to the touch.

Looking further, he could tell that his muscles were definately smaller and weaker now.

"So, am I becoming some kid or girl now?" wondered Naruto. He put his shirt back down and tried to wonder about it. It was a good thing that he was alone now so no one could witness this kind of transformation.

If only he knew that he was becoming both a kid and a girl.
145322222222222222222222222222111111.title: Takes scroll out (changes continue)

choices: New Look for the Face and Hair
1453222222222222222222222222221111111.content:
Suddenly, Naruto felt a slight burning in his eyes, as if they were also reforming in some way or form.

"Oww!" yelled Naruto as his hands covered his eyes. It wasn't exactly painful but it wasn't pleasant either. Reserves of chakra were starting to form in his eyes, as his very DNA was begin rewritten to include this very special techinique. Underneath his hands and eyelids, his bright blue eyes started to pale, the pupils in the middle beginning to fade away into a colorless pool.

Once the pain vanished, Naruto sighed in relief although his eyes still stung a bit. He looked back into the lake and gasped at his reflection. His eyes now weren't just ordinary eyes; they were the signature eyes of the Hyuga clan.

"These eyes. Just like Neji and Hinata" said Naruto, remembering his two friends from the Hyuga clan. Now Naruto was really confused. Just what was this scroll? His age was decreasing and he was becoming somewhat feminine. Now he gets the trademark eyes of the Hyugas. What could be next?

"Sheesh, what's next?" said a frustrated Naruto as he threw his hands in the air, clearly fustrated. However, he didn't get much time as his body was taking on a drastic change now. Suddenly, his body wracked with what was undoubtedly pain as he clutched over and held his stomach. This time, unlike when his muscles changed, this time it was his bones and body structure. They were reconstructing to fit his new role.

"Augh! Damn it!" yelled Naruto, still using the 8-year old feminine voice that still didn't sound at all familiar to him. However, how could he? He has never even met the girl he's becoming. Anyway, his bones shrank and reformed, becoming closer to the young girl he was becoming. His internal organs also changed up to fit his new role. However, his 'manhood' stayed in tact for now. Also, apparently this girl hadn't started puberty yet so there wasn't much expansion of his hips, butt, or growth of breasts.

After a minute, the pain subsided and Naruto got back up, panting as he did. He truely felt small now. Not exactly weak as he always had the 9-Tails with him but nothing could prepare him for what was next.
1453222222222222222222222222221111111.title: A New Kekkei Genkai

14532222222222222222222222222211111111.content:
Suddenly, Naruto felt an extreme itching in his scalp. It felt really bad as he moved a hand to feel the top of his head. His eyes widen as he felt his normally spiky blonde hair start to flaten against his now smaller head and startt to cascade down his head. Soon, it reached his shoulders and continued downward. Once it reached his waist, it stopped and then started to darken. His blonde hair turned to a dark brown color.

"Oh great" said Naruto with sarcasm. He still had no idea who he was becoming. Then, he felt his face confort as he knew his face was changing next.

"Ugh!" yelled Naruto as he went back to the lake and looked at his reflection. He watched in horror as his face started to mold and shift. His skin was much smoother and the whisker marks on his cheeks vanished instantly. His nose became small and cute with his lips doing the same. His face overall became smoother with a little baby fat as this was an 8-year old he was becoming.

Soon enough, Naruto had the face of Hanabi, not that he knew that. All he saw was the face of a strange girl.

"So, next would be.." said Naruto.
14532222222222222222222222222211111111.title: New Look for the Face and Hair

145322222222222222222222222222111111111.content:
As Naruto pretty much figured, he started feeling a slightly painful feeling in his groin, causing him to bucker over in the disomfort.

"Ugh, this one is pretty fierce!" said Naruto as he battled the pain. Underneath his clothes, his manhood started to get sucked into his groin. Underneath, a vagina was forming. Soon enough, the balls and main areas of the manhood were sucked into his body where they became a pair of ovaries, leaving a fully functional vagina behind and leaving no physciall indication of who Naruto once was.

Before Naruto could recover, his clothing started changing to match his new form. His boxers turned violet and became a pair of panties very quickly. His pants turned dark and changed material to something most other ninjas wear. His zori sandals turned dark as well from their normal blue. Underneath his shirt, a mesh sleeveless shirt formed over his small body. Then, his black t-shirt became the same dark color as his pants and conformed onto his new body.

Soon enough, Naruto finally felt the feeling stop and looked again in the lake. No longer did he look anything like he did before. The face and form of Hanabi Hyuga was staring back at him.

"Just who is this girl and why did I become her?" asked Naruto in his confusion.

Now, with him fully transformed, the story an finally begin.
145322222222222222222222222222111111111.title: The Final Changes (sex and clothes)

1453222222222222222222222222221111111111.content:
"Hmm, Hanabi?" asked a feminine voice from nearby. Naruto turned around and saw his crush, Sakura Haruno, coming into the training site. Naruto didn't know how to react. How would she believe what he just went through?

"What are you doing out here? Training?" asked Sakura, oblivious to whom she was really talking too. Naruto decided that he needed to clear this up fast.

"Um, actually Sakura. It's me, Naruto" said Naruto honestly. Sakura gave him a wierd look that said that she didn't believe what he just said. "It's true Sakura. I found this wierd scroll and it turned me into this girl" pleaded Naruto. Sakura didn't look convinced.

"Um, I don't know what you're talking about, but prove it" said Sakura. Naruto thought of whatever he could say to convince Sakura. Then, he smiled as he thought of it.

"When we were chasing Sasuke during the Chunin Exams, Pakkun said you used the same shampoo as he does" said Naruto, chuckling at the memory of the event. Sakura's face paled as the unfortunate memory of her learning she smelled like a dog came back to her. However, she shook out of it quickly after she realized only Naruto and Pakkun knew of that.

"N-Naruto?" asked Sakura.

"Yes!" yelled Naruto, still getting used to Hanabi's 8-year old voice. Then, Sakura got an incredulous look.

"Are you sure you're not fooling me with some Transformation Jutsu?" asked Sakura.

"You'd think I'd do this? I don't even know who this girl is" said Naruto.

"Really? I'm sure you can tell from the eyes" said Sakura.

"Well yeah, I'd guess she's a hyuga. I guess I kind of look like Hinata but this is Neji's hair color" said Naruto, confused as to who he was. Sakura understood as Naruto had never met the girl.

"You're Hanabi Hyuga. She's Hinata's little sister. She was believed to be even stronger than Hinata and almost as strong as Neji" said Sakura.

"Hanabi huh?" muttered Naruto.

He was glad he at least knew who he was now.
1453222222222222222222222222221111111111.title: Sakura comes in

1453222222222222222222222222221111111111.content:
Naruto shook his, or rather her, head. He didn't know how to make heads or tails of this. He know knew who he was, but it didn't exactly help much. Sakura looked at him with a confounded look. She was convinced that Naruto wasn't pranking her this time, but how in the world did his form actually change like this?

"Naruto, let me see that scroll you mentioned" said Sakura, wanting to get to the bottom of this. Naruto complied with no problem and handed it over to her.

"Well, anything?" asked Naruto.

"Wierd. I can't make heads or tails of this. It doesn't seem to be of any worth" said Sakura.

"Well, it obviously is!" Naruto yelled. Unfortunately, due to him having Hanabi's voice, it didn't sound that threatening. Sakura actually giggled a bit at how cute he sounded. However, after wrapping the scroll back up, her expression turned serious.

"I think we need to see Lady Tsunade about this. At the very least, she needs to know" said Sakura. Naruto sighed.

"Oh man, not Grandma Tsunade" he muttered.

******A few minutes later, at the Hokage's office******

"Hahahahahaha!!" laughed Tsunade as she heard the story. Naruto and Sakura went right to the Hokage's office as Sakura suggested. However, after convincing her that the little girl in front of her was really Naruto, she burst into laughter.

"That hurts grandma. Really" said Naruto, hanging is head in disappointment. Tsunade then regained her composure though chuckles still leaked out.

"Sorry brat, but it was just too funny. I believe you, but the fact that this of all things happened to you was too good to pass up" said Tsunade. Naruto and Sakura sweat dropped at the Hokage's behavior.

"Anyway. Can anything be done? Is he stuck like this?" asked Sakura, worrying Naruto as to what she was implying. Tsunade's expression turned a little more serious but not much.

"Well from what little I can gain from the scroll, it appears to be some sort of jutsu that completely changes the user's form. I don't see a way for him to change back" said Tsunade, more serious this time. Naruto grabbed his head.

"You're serious?! I'm stuck as some little Hyuga girl for the rest of my life?!" yelled Naruto in frustration.

"Well, I imagine you won't be little forever. You'll grow up normally" said Tsunade. That didn't help Naruto much. He was so glad that they were the only ones in the room right now.

"Well now what, milady? I don't think Naruto can live on his own anymore. Not like this" said Sakura with concern in her voice. Naruto gave her a strange look.

"What do you mean? I've been living by myself since I was 5" said Naruto, defending himself. Tsunade shook her head however.

"Perhaps Naruto, but now you have the body of a healthy Hyuga. I don't know how I'm going to break this to the others, but the clan itself might not like you living by yourself. After all, you have the Byakugan now, and you know how strict they are with protecting it" said Tsunade. Naruto and Sakura nodded, as they knew the story of the Hyugas already from Neji.

Suddenly, there was a knock on the door.

"Lady Hokage, may I come in?" came a shy voice. Everyone in the room knew who it was. It was Hinata, their fellow classmate and Hanabi's older sister. She was delivering some documents that needed to be handed to the Hokage.

"Well this should be good" said Tsunade, as she motioned for Hinata to come in.
1453222222222222222222222222221111111111.title: Following that

1453222222222222222222222222221111111111.content:
"Are you sure this is a good idea?" asked Naruto. He was quite nervous about one of his friends figuring out what happened.

"They'll figure it out eventually" said Sakura. Naruto knew she was right, but he didn't want to agree with it. However, the choice was taken out of his hands when the door opened, revealing Hinata carrying a small load of documents. However, what surprised everyone more was that a small figure was with her, carrying some as well. It was the real Hanabi Hyuga.

"Uh oh" thought Naruto, Sakura, and Tsunade when they noticed who it was. On the bright side though, it was a good chance to get this out of the way.

"I've brought these from..." started Hinata, until her eyes landed on Sakura and a figure that looked just like her sister. Her eyes widened as she looked back and forth between Hanabi and the Hanabi look-alike in front of her. Needless to say, she was quite confused. Hanabi was confused too, although also a little irritated that someone had the gall to transform into her.

"I don't know who you are, but I would appreciate if you would stop mimicing me" said Hanabi in a voice that was stern but polite at the same time. Naruto sheepishly grinned.

"I'd love to. Unfortunately I can't. I'm stuck like this" said Naruto. Hanabi raised an eyebrow, confused. Meanwhile, Hinata finally found her voice again.

"Who are you?" she asked politely. Naruto dreaded this part.

"Actually Hinata, it's me Naruto" said Naruto. The look on Hinata's face was a mixture of surprise and skepticism. Before she could reply, Naruto continued. "Before you ask, it really is me. I found this magic scroll that apparently changed me into her for good. If you don't think it's me, I remember talking with you at the Training Posts before my battle with Neji" he continued, gesturing to Hanabi at the approriate time.

Hinata absolutely gasped at this, convinced by the scenario he gave that it really was Naruto. Wait, so that meant that....Naruto...became Hanabi...for good? Hinata responded in the only way she knew.

She fainted.

"Well that turned out as expected" said Tsunade. Sakura sheepishly laughed as well. Meanwhile, Hanabi gasped too. Hinata told her almost everything, so she knew about Hinata's interactions with her friends. For her to react like that, they must be telling the truth. The 8-year old wasn't stupid.

"So, some wierd scroll turned you into me forever?" asked Hanabi, becoming a little exasperated. Naruto gave a sad smile on his face.

"Yes, unfortunately" he said. Hanabi was unsure how to react to this. Clearly, she hadn't been trained to deal with this, given her limited interactions with people outside of her clan.

"Sorry" said Naruto sincerely. The last thing he wanted to do today was to take on someone else's form. Surprisingly, Hanabi composed herself for when she spoke next.

"It's fine I guess. You didn't intentionally want to do this" said Hanabi, clearly taking it better than her older sister did.

"On the bright side, you now have a twin sister to play with!" said Sakura with a gleeful smile on her face.

"Seriously?! You say that now?!" yelled Naruto at Sakura. Seeing an image of herself shouting at Sakura made Hanabi feel wierd inside. To be honest though, the thought of having a sister her own age intrigued her.

"All right that's enough. Sakura, you and Hanabi take Hinata outside and try to wake her up. I'd like to talk to Naruto in private for a minute" said Tsunade with a serious look. Sakura and Hanabi nodded and carried out Hinata's limp form out the door. Naruto laughed a bit at the amusing sight. Then, he turned to Tsunade.

"Now Naruto, do you still have the Nine Tails' within you?" asked Tsunade. Naruto figured she was going to go there eventually.

"Yeah, I can still feel him. The seal is still there on my stomach. It doesn't feel any different than normal" said Naruto. Tsunade breathed a sigh of relief.

"Good. At least whatever this was didn't effect the seal at all. All right Naruto, I'm going to call Hiashi here and talk to him about this. As you may or may not know, he is Hinata and Hanabi's father. Meanwhile, you wait with the others outside the building" said Tsunade.

"You got it" said Naruto as he excused himself.
1453222222222222222222222222221111111111.title: Hinata and Hanabi

1453222222222222222222222222221111111111.content:
Outside the tower, Naruto walked over to where the others were, explaining that Tsunade didn't talk about much. Sakura concerned herself with trying to wake up Hinata, who was really passed out this time.

However, this worked out well, as Hanabi wanted to talk to Naruto.

"Hey, it's Naruto correct? Can we talk over there?" she suggested, pointing to a nearby bench. Naruto nodded. He figured that she would want to talk eventually. The sun looked like it was beginning to set in the sky. After taking seats, Hanabi broke the silence.

"So, you're the famous Naruto that my sister always talks about and the one who beat my cousin. Didn't think this would be how I would meet you face to face. A far cry from when I first saw you" started Hanabi. Naruto was surprised to hear that Hinata always talked about him, but he shoved that aside.

"When you first saw me?" he asked.

"I was in the crowd during the Chunin Exams. I was there to see you beat Neji. To this day, I'm still surprised you beat him. I didn't think anyone could" said Hanabi, a hint of admiration in her voice. Naruto then flashed his usual bright smile, which looked incredibly wierd on Hanabi's face.

"Well, I am pretty awesome. He was a tough one all right. I hear that you're almost as strong as he is though, right?" asked Naruto. Hanabi looked a little surprised at that.

"I'm not quite that strong" she replied in a small voice. Anyway, she wanted to continued the conversation. "Anyway, this is so hard to believe. Of all the people in the world, that scroll turned you into me. That's really wierd" she continued.

"Yeah really. Well, I guess it can't be helped much. I'm not going to let this derail me from becoming Hokage" said Naruto, his usual confidence coming back. Hanabi actually giggled this time, partly amused by both his declaration and how it looked with her body.

"Well, given what I've heard, you might be good enough some day. Although you might want to prepare yourself for a rough time until then" said Hanabi.

"Why?" asked Naruto.

"From what I can see, you have the Byakugan like me. I don't have a clue as to how my family will take this, given what lengths they go to to keep it safe" she said. Naruto nodded.

"I know. I heard that already" said Naruto, his head dropping. He really wasn't looking forward to dealing with the Hyuga clan. Then, Hanabi actually flashed a small smile.

"Don't worry, I'll help you out. It's only fair, and I don't know many people outside of my clan. I don't have any friends my own age" said Hanabi. Naruto began to perk up.

"Really? Then I am that first friend!" said Naruto, feeling better now that Hanabi agreed to help him. He responded by giving her a big hug, one that almost crushed her lungs.

"N-No problem" she said as Naruto let her go.

*****Hokage's Office*****

Hiashi had arrived and had heard everything from Tsunade. This turn of events surprised even him. Honestly, he felt sorry for Naruto. He was a good friend of his parents, Minato and Kushina. To have this unfortunate event dropped on Naruto was only the latest in a series of cruel events for him.

"Sorry to place this on you suddenly, but I don't see any other options" said Tsunade.

"Don't worry. I will do as you please. I'll determine what to do with Naruto once we get back home. I'll make sure he is handled the right way. If I don't, Kushina will hunt me down" said Hiashi, a hint of humor in his normally monotone voice. Tsunade chuckled a bit at that.

"True true. All right, you know what to do" said Tsunade as Hiashi walked out of the office. As he did, Tsunade sighed and leaned back in her chair.

"I need a drink. Lots of drinks"
1453222222222222222222222222221111111111.title: Naruto and Hanabi talk

1453222222222222222222222222221111111111.content:
Naruto and Hanabi were still on the bench when Hiashi finally left the office. Before he came down, they were still conversing, with Hanabi bringing a couple topics up.

"We'll have to do something about your appearance though. If you always look and dress like me, no one will tell us apart." spoke Hanabi. Naruto looked down at himself, seeing that he and Hanabi were in the exact same clothes.

"I guess you're right. I certainly don't want to get mixed up with you." said Naruto.

"Perhaps I should do something about your hair too. That could help. I'll give it some thought." she contemplated. Naruto really wasn't looking forward to that. Then, she brought up another topic.

"Also, you'll need a name too. No offense, but Naruto sounds really weird given how you look now." said Hanabi. Now Naruto knew that topic was going to come eventually. He, of course, liked his name, but Hanabi was right in the sense that it wouldn't help him right now.

"Can we do that later?" he asked.

"Sure. I'm in no rush." said Hanabi.

Just then, Hiashi starting approaching them from the Hokage building, his face stoic as usual, although Hanabi could sense great uneasiness from him. Contrary to what others viewed him as a cold leader, he wasn't anything of the sort. As he got to them, he looked back and forth between them, with Hanabi pointing at Naruto so he knew.

"Hello Naruto. Sorry that I had to meet you under these circumstances." he said. Naruto gave a sheepish grin.

"Ah, it's alright. It's kind of my fault for getting myself into this mess anyway. So, you're Hanabi and Hinata's dad right?" asked Naruto.

"Correct, I am Hiashi Hyuga." introduced the man. "Now, if it's alright, we should head home now. No doubt that there will be much explaining to do."

"Yes father." spoke Hanabi. "Come on Naruto, you have to come too. You should get acquainted as soon as possible."

"Okay." said Naruto, allowing Hanabi to pull him along gently. Before they left, they saw that Sakura was still tending to a still-unconscious Hinata. She assured them that she would tell her to get home once she woke up.

"So, what's going to happen now?" asked Naruto.

"Well, this is an unprecedented incident, so it's hard to say." started Hiashi. "But I'll come up with something. I don't think you should be held to the full standards of our clan, especially because I know some things just won't suit your style."

"I guess we'll figure out more once we get home." spoke Hanabi.

Not much was spoken after that.

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Ninja outfit (reserved)

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
15-year old ninja Naruto Uzumaki was walking down the roads of the Hidden Leaf Village. It had been a long while since he finally returned from his long training trip with Jiraiya and ended up saving Gaara some time ago. Now, there really wasn't much to do. The Akatsuki apparently was on break or something, considering that they hadn't done anything in a while. This gave Naruto more time to properly prepare himself.

Now however, he had trained earlier and he was bored out of his mind.

"Sheesh, what's a guy got to do around here?" wondered Naruto as he placed his hands behind his head. Most of his fellow class of ninja were doing something else today, leaving the blonde ninja to just wonder by himself.

As he walked along, something caught the corner of his eye. It was a scroll, wrapped up perfectly and sitting on the ground. Naruto raised an eyebrow as he looked at it. He was a little more perceptive now but he was still a very curious boy.

"Hmm, what could this be?" asked Naruto as he walked over and observed the scroll and picked it up. It was yellow in color and gave off a wierd energy.

"Let's see what this is" he said as he slowly unwrapped the scroll. At first, nothing happened. The characters on the sroll were confusing to Naruto and he couldn't figure out what it was about.

Suddenly, th scroll glowed bright yellow and and a burst of light slammed Naruto in the chest, sealing his fate as what would become of him now.
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Kushina's Daughter

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Ugh, what hit me?" asked Naruto as he groggily got up. That was so wierd. That was his thoughts anyway as he looked at himself. As far as he could tell, he was the same old person he always was. There, sitting a few feet from him, was the wierd scroll.

"What did this things do?" asked Naruto as he picked up the scroll. It looked a little faded, as if it's power was gone now. Naruto raised an eyebrow at the characters which were now even more confusing.

"Well, it might not hurt to keep this with me" said Naruto with a small grin as he put the scroll into his pouch. Now, he had to figure out what to do next. Instantly, his stomach started rumbling.

"Hmm, guess I could use some lunch. Off to Ichiraku's then!" yelled Naruto at the mention of his favorite ramen shop. With a small skip in his step, he started on his way there.

As he walked along, he started feeling something odd against his skin. Well, it wasn't really his skin feeling odd, but rather his clothing. It was starting to feel...smoother to an extent. Naruto looked down but didn't really see anything odd for now.

"Wierd" said Naruto as he kept walking along. Little known to him, his black and orange jacket was starting to mold and reform into something reslembling a black and orange kimono-like blouse. His pants were becoming to conform a bit to his body while becoming shorter as the leggings now only reached just below his knees.

Underneath his jacket, his mesh t-shirt remained unchanged. It probably would be the only thing that remained unchanged.

"Wow, quite a breeze" said Naruto as he shivered slightly under the slight chilly wind. This was the beginning of his skin beginning to soften up as it became smoother and more sensative to the touch.
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Naruto gets up

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Hey Naruto!" yelled a female voice that shook Naruto out of his thoughts. It was his teammate, Sakura Haruno. Normally, Naruto would be delighted at the sight of the pink-haired medic. However, he wasn't sure now regarding his odd feelings.

"What'cha doing?" asked Sakura with a smile. Today, she was wearing her casual clothing.

"Oh, um, nothing" said Naruto, trying to sound as normal as possible. Sakura raised an eyebrow at his answer.

"It doesn't sound like..." Sakura started. "Wait, what's up with your clothing?" asked Sakura with her eyes wide open. Naruto looked down and saw in shock at what was happening. His orange and black jacket had conformed to his body in the form of a kimono-like blouse. It had sleeves that were a little loose. The overall color was orange with black stripes on the edges. His pants had completely rided up his legs and turned black in color

Naruto knew that he had to get out of here and fast!

"Um, gotta run!" yelled Naruto as he jumped away from Sakura, who was completely confused.

"Um, was I seeing things or something?" asked Sakura. She made plans to visit Naruto and see what was going on.

"What is going on?" asked Naruto as he jumped from house to house to get to his own apartment. As he did, his pants split apart to become a short black skirt that reached halfway to his thighs. Underneath, a pair of small black shorts formed as to keep others from looking underneath the skirt.
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Encountering Sakura

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Naruto quickly ran back to his apartment and closed the door behind him. He was breathing hard as he closed it, hoping that not many others saw what was happening.

"What is happening? It was so embaressing to have Sakura see me...." said Naruto as he started coughing a bit. His throat suddenly felt hoarse and he kept coughing for a few more minutes.

"...like that" said Naruto as he finished his sentence. However, he gasped as he did. His voice was totally unfamiliar! It was high-pitched and feminine, and reminded him of something like Sakuras.

"Is this really my voice?" asked Naruto, trying to figure this out. However, the changes weren't taking breaks.

Suddenly, he felt something smooth ride up his long and slender legs. He looked down and gasped again. His legs, which were already smoother, were now longer and slender, perfect for a woman. However, Naruto didn't have much time to reflect on that as his shoes were responding to the changes. His otherwise normal black shoes crawled up his legs, ending below his legs and making them similar to Sakura's boots (no heel though). If that wasn't surprising enough, black stockings started covering his feet and legs and ended at his thighs, a bit below the hem of the black skirt.

"This is nuts" said Naruto as he looked at his newest changes. He saw how much smaller and delicate his feet seemed to be now and most of his height now seemed to come from his legs.

However, Naruto decided to go to his room as he felt something bad going on in there.

Except that now, there were some more feminine things around. As he looked around, his now black boots changed to a dark red color while a slight heel formed, making them very similar to Sakura's.

His bed was still the same, thankfully. However, now there was a vanity set with a full-length mirror. There was some make-up with it and a comb. His room was much cleaner and smelled better as well. However, for odd reasons, his clothing was still the same, which meant that he would eventually have to go shopping for some stuff.

"Oh great! Now this?!" yelled Naruto is his feminine voice as he looked around. He then looked into his dressers and cabinets, relived that at least his scrolls and such were still the same as normal.

Then, Naruto looked into his bathroom and looked around it as well. His toothbrush and toothpaste were the same, as was his bar soap. However, his hair shampoo was now strawberry-scented and more suited for females.

"At least there's not much diff.." started Naruto as he felt changes throughout his body and doubled over in discomfort. Now, his hips were filling with womanly flesh and becoming larger and child-bearing, going to about 36' wide. His butt also expanded to suit his new hips, giving him a rather nice figure that even Sakura might be jealous of.

In additon, his skin was completely smooth and feminine now. No blemishes were left and no body hair was on him, except for the amount on his head.

Now what?

"Oh man, w-what am I going to do?" asked Naruto as he walked back into his room. He didn't know what was going on exactly. Although, he was smart enough to know that his features were becoming increasingly feminine. He looked at himself and thought that he kind of looked like Sakura in some places. However, he was sure that he wasn't becoming her.

"Hello Naruto" said a casual voice. Naruto shuddered, as if things couldn't get worse for him. Sitting there on his window was his sensei, Kakashi Hatake. He had the usual look on his face and his familiar Make Out Paradise book with him.

"K-Kakashi-sensei?!" said Naruto. He wasn't sure if he liked the idea of his sensei seeing him like this. He could tell that Kakashi was confused as well.

"Um Naruto, what's up with that get up?" he asked. Naruto stuttered as he couldn't think of an explanation. Then, as he started to feel an itch in his scalp, Kakashi spoke up again. "And what is up with your hair?" he asked as well.

Naruto's eyes widened at the question and he started to feel the itch coming from his scalp. Suddenly, he saw a flash of yellow hair fly past his face, as his blonde hair grew out, going past his shoulders and going down to his waist. Before Naruto could react, the strands of hair darkened, and they became red, sort of like a dark plum color. Naruto was stunned by this. Kakashi was surprised but didn't know what to think.

"Um, Naruto..." he started. However, before he could go on, Naruto closed his window, yelling for Kakashi to stay out of his house.

"I hope that keeps him out for now" said Naruto. Meanwhile, Kakashi had some interesting thoughts going through his head.

'That hair and that figure. It kind of reminded me of Kushina. I doubt Naruto would play a prank like this so something must be up. Maybe I'll give him his space for a while' thought Kakashi as he jumped away, leaving Naruto to his own thoughts.
