1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Naruto saw his new female relfection in the mirror. He knew that he definately wasn't a female version of himself, as this girl was totally different. However, he did see that his headband was still black and in the same spot as usual.

"Guess that's it" said Naruto in his new female voice. Suddenly, he felt a knocking on the door.

"Hello? Naruto, are you home?!" yelled the voice. It was Sakura's! Naruto was at first worried. However, he then reconsidered. He would have to face everyone eventually. Might as well start now. With that in mind, he walked over to the door, trying to get a hang of how differently he was walking thanks to his new assets. He got the door and opened it, to Sakura's surprise.

"Huh? Who are you? Where's Naruto?" asked Sakura, a little calm but with a little worry. Naruto sighed.

"Sakura....It's me, Naruto" said Naruto. Sakura raised an eyebrow in disbelief.

"Seriously? Naruto's a guy, not a girl. Why don't you prove it?" asked Sakura, not expecting the girl in front of her to prove it. However, Naruto knew many things that only he would know about Sakura.

"During the Chunin Exams, Pakkun said that you used the same shampoo that he used" said Naruto with a cheeky smirk. Sakura paled immensely at the memory of the event. She remembered how depressing it was to recieve a line like that. However, she was brought out of it when she figured out that only Naruto and Pakkun knew that.

"N-Naruto?" asked Sakura.

"The one and only" said Naruto, nonchalantly. Sakura once again raised an eyebrow and looked Naruto over.

"So if you're Naruto, what's up with the new look? Why don't you drop the Transformation Jutsu?" asked Sakura. Naruto sighed as he knew that he would have to explain this now.

"Actually, I'm not using a jutsu. You see, I found this scroll on the ground and opened it up. Then, it hit me with a burst of light. Suddenly, I find myself slowly becoming this person" explained Naruto. Sakura found it unbelieveable, but she didn't think Naruto would lie in this situation.

"Can I see the scrool then?" asked Sakura politely. Naruto nodded and retrieved the scroll from his pouch and gave it to Sakura. She opened it and looked it over.

"I can't read a word on this thing" said Sakura as she closed it up.

"You see?" said Naruto.

"You sure that you're not pulling my leg here?" questioned Sakura.

"I swear Sakura. I would not prank you with something like this. This body feels so wierd" said Naruto. Sakura was pretty much convinced now that Naruto was being truthful.

"By the way, do you know this girl?" asked Naruto, wanting to know who he was now. Sakura shook her head.

"No, I dont. I guess you either became a replica of a girl somewhere or perhaps a new original girl or something. Anyway, let's go to Lady Tsunade. She'll know what to do" said Sakura.

"Grandma Tsunade huh? Guess there's no other choice" said Naruto. With that, the 2 ninjas jumped away, heading towards the Hokage's office.
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sakura Arrives

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Naruto and Sakura walked inside the Hokage's building and approached the office doors. Naruto was nervous as to what to do when they saw Tsunade. However, Sakura assured him that it'll be fine and they'll figure something out. With that in mind, Naruto and Sakura walked in. Tsunade heard them and gasped slightly at Naruto's look.

'Kushina? No, it's not, but someone similar' thought Tsunade. Shizune almost had similar thoughts.

"Hello milady, we have something to tell you. Tell them Naruto" said Sakura. Tsunade and Shizune were surprised and confused when Sakura said that. With a little hesitation, Naruto retold his story to the two older women. They also looked at the scroll Naruto had and also couldn't figure it out.

"What a story" said Shuzine with a sigh. A minute later, they summoned Kakashi and Sai (their other teammate) and retold the story to them, surprising them both.

"Interesting" said Kakashi as Sai had a surprised look himself. However, Naruto just wanted to know who he was now.

"Excuse me, but does anyone know who I am now? Did I become someone else?" he asked. Tsunade looked down in thought and came up with an explanation.

"Well, you kind of resemble Kushina Uzumaki" said Tsunade. Naruto's eyes widened at the name she suggested.

"Uzumaki? Is she related to me?" he asked.

"Yes, she was your mother" said Tsunade. Kakashi and Shizune were curious as to how Tsunade was going to handle this, considering that Naruto knew nothing of his parents yet. After hearing this, Naruto was totally shocked.

"What?! I became my mother?!" he asked, not wanting to believe it. However, Tsunade calmed him down.

"I'm not quite sure. You do resemble her, but not entirely. I think some DNA tests should be done" said Tsunade. Everyone agreed and Naruto gave them some of his blood for them to examine. Luckily, they made pretty fast work of the tests and soon the medic in charge of it gave the results to Tsunade.

"Interesting" said Tsunade.

"What is?" asked Naruto as everyone was present in the Hokage's office once again.

"You are not Kushina exactly. Judging by the DNA results, you are still her child so to speak" said Tsunade.

"What exactly does that mean?" asked Kakashi. Tsunade thought for aminute before explaining.

"Basically, Naruto orignally looked almost identical to his father. You kind of inherited your father's looks and your mother's personality. However, it seems like this scroll kind of switched the genes so to speak. In other words, instead of a son resembling his father, you became a daughter resembling her mother" explained Tsunade, to Naruto and Sakura's surprise.

"So, Naruto is still their child, except that he became a girl resembling his mother instead of the other way around, which is what he used to be?" asked Sakura. Tsunade nodded.

"So that's how it is" said Naruto to himself, surprisingly calmer than he thought he would be.

"Also, I doubt that it's reversable so Naruto is likely stuck like that" said Tsunade. Naruto sighed and hung his head in sadness. Sakura gently rubbed his back.

"Don't worry Naruto. We'll help you through this" said Sakura. Sai nodded in support as well and Kakashi would help also, at least if he didn't want to get killed.

"So Naruto, did anything else change besides your body?" asked Tsunade. Naruto remembered his room.

"Well, my room changed a but. It had one of those full-length mirrors a one of those sets that girls use with make-up and such" said Naruto. Everyone understood that he was talking about a vanity set. Otherwise, Naruto noted the change in his hair shampoo and that was it.

"So, you currently have no clothes. I guess you'll need new ones. I'll supply you with some money. Sakura, you go help Naruto with this and with anything else he needs to know" said Tsunade.

"Yes milady!" said Sakura with a salute.

"Great, guess you're all dismissed then. Let me know in the future how things are going Naruto" said Tsunade, getting a nod from Naruto.

With that, Sakura and Naruto had to do a little shopping.
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Meeting with Tsunade

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
As Sakura and Naruto walked through the hallways, Naruto kept pushing his waist-length red hair behind his ears. It was kind of annoying him. He needed to ask Sakura about this. There was also the issue of how long his nails were.

"Um, Sakura" said Naruto, getting her attention. She turned around with a smile.

"Yes?" she asked.

"C-Can I ask you for a favor?" asked Naruto with a little nervousness.

"Sure Naruto. I'll gladly help you out with anything you need" said Sakura. Naruto was relieved to hear that.

"Well, can you give me a haircut? This long hair is kind of annoying. Also, I keep scratching myself too hard with my nails being this long" said Naruto. Sakura nooded her head, knowing how frustrating those kinds of things can be. That's why she kept her hair shorter now.

"Sure, I can help you. Come with me and I can shorten your nails" said Sakura as she gently took Naruto's hand and lead him towards the girls bathroom, something that Naruto started protesting.

"Wait, that's the girls room!" said Naruto in fright, as he remembered the last time he went into a girls' room.

"Naruto, you are a girl now. It's cool now" said Sakura. Naruto remembered that and reluctantly went in with her. Sakura brought him in and sat down. Sakura took a filer out of her pouch and started to shorten Naruto's nails.

"Yeah, these can be a pain when they're really long" said Sakura. Naruto was glad that she sympathized with him. Soon enough, Sakura had shortened his nails to a much shorter length. Still a little logner than a guy's nails, but not long enough to go beyond the fingertips.

"Thanks a bunch Sakura!" said Naruto, his usual enthusiasm back.

"You're welcome" said Sakura as the two of them walked out of the Hokage's building.

The weird tingling continued, driving Naruto crazy. “It feels good, but why won't it stop?” The sensation distracted Naruto from his changing clothes. The sandals he always wore grew to a larger size, wrappings began to materialize around the ankles. The normally bright orange pants began to darken in color until they became purple, a red belt around the waist began to form keeping the now larger pants up. The boxers Naruto wore shifted into a pair of panties, though the discomfort of them and his new pants constricting the crotch was not at the forefront of the young ninja's mind, the pleasurable tingle that still coursed through his body droned out any discomfort. The jacket changed in a more drastic manner than the pants.

First, the long sleeves separated from the jacket at about the ¾ length, and then once more. What was near the hands became black fingerless gloves. The cloth that covered the arms turned into more wrappings that went from the base of the hands, covered the elbows and ended at what was left of the jacket. Then, the jacket absorbs some of the material from the undershirt, and what remained of it became a bra. The jacket with its excess material started to weave itself into a light, yet tough shirt that was black from the neck to the chest, and violet below. The only article of clothing that remained unchanged was the headband and forehead protector, still emblazoned with his home's iconic leaf symbol.

After the clothes changed, the tingling stopped for a moment, leaving Naruto to regain his senses. “What a rush, I don't think I've ever felt that good before,...or exhausted.” While bringing his right hand to his brow, now noticing the changes to his wardrobe that have been happening when he was preoccupied. “What the hell happened? Where did these clothes come from? Am I wearing a bra?” This line of thought was interrupted by the tingling sensation again, only this time it was more intense than before.

Still screaming out in ecstasy, Naruto's body changed. He lost all of his body hair below the eyebrows. His skin became smoother, softer, and lighter in complexion. 1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The mindscape, the pipes, water and oppressing atmosphere were a dead give away. Naruto wasn't all that surprised that the Kyuubi was involved in what happened to her. After trekking what seemed like an eternity down the one corridor, the small space opened up into a giant room. Naruto stared ahead glaring at the Kyuubi still behind the massive bars.

“Hello Yugito. I have been waiting so long for you, my love.” The demon fox stated completely ignoring the scowl on the woman in front of it. “Cut the crap fox, you know that I am a man and my name is Naruto!” Was her response. “Really? Listen to yourself. You have a woman's voice and you have a woman's body.” The fox stated staring down at its container. “I don't believe you.” She repling in a cold, hard tone.

The fox sighed, she was being stubborn, not surprising given her lineage. “Take a good look at yourself, then.” A sheet of water shot up, reflecting the woman's image. After a minute the water dropped back down. Disbelief was plastered on her face, “no! No! No!” She screamed for a few minutes, while holding her head. After calming down, the transformation began to sink in. “I am a woman.” Naruto thought as she looked at her now trembling hands. “I...I am a woman.” She choked out. “Yes, Yugito. You are a woman, a beautiful woman and my mate.” The fox said knocking her out of her own little world. “Yugito...is NOT my name! It is Naruto Uzumaki!” She yelled defiantly. “I may not be a man anymore, but I'm still Naruto Uzumaki.”

The demon's loud laughter echoed across the mindscape. “Yes!” It exclaimed. “Yes! That fire! That spirit! Yugito, you are truly my mate!” The kunoichi started charging at the beast, hoping to silence it once and for all. In retrospect, that was probably a bad idea.

After passing through the gates, red tendrils of demonic chakra burst from the ground and restrained Naruto. The Kyuubi appeared before the bound woman in the form of a tall, well built, but not overly muscular man, with red hair, red slitted eyes, whisker marks, fox ears and nine tails, all draped in a blood red kimono. Taking his clawed hand, he caresses her right cheek and looks lovingly into her eyes. “Yugito, oh my sweet Yugito. Your body isn't the only thing to change.” Shocked, Naruto replied with a weak, “no.” “Yes, my dear. That jutsu does more than alter the body, it alters time and memories as well. The seal and my demonic chakra, which is why I am not and never will be affected, are holding it back for the moment. Soon the seal will change as well, leaving my chakra the only thing that keeps your old life intact. Which I will release, making you mine.” “Why? Why are you doing this?” Naruto cried out, tears streaming from her face.

“Because Yugito, I have spent almost a century sealed. Nearly a 100 years in almost unending solitude, this..shape you see is my humanoid form, the form I take to mate. We foxes are a lustful kind. Sex, and companionship are vital to us, it is not just for propagating our species, but it gives us our powers. It is a meditation that we do to help us become one with nature. In all that time, I have been alone, not any more. Now Yugito, it is time for us to become one.” Naruto was about to scream, but the Kyuubi's eyes glowed, causing Naruto's to glaze over. The memories and reality itself started to warp, and after a few moments the chakra binds were released causing Yugito to fall, but the fox grabs her. A large bed appears and Kyuubi gently places her down on it.

He then strokes her cheek again, “Yugito, how I want to take you right now and show you the beauty of the mating ritual. This,...this waiting is torture, but soon very soon, we shall both experience pleasure.” She started to squirm and moaned out slightly, which the Kyuubi thought was cute. “I've waited almost a hundred years, I can maintain my composure for a little longer.” Soon her eyes opened, only to come face to face with her companion. In a split second, Yugito jumped up and began furiously kissing her lover. When she started to take off his kimono, he grabs her arms and pushes her away. “Why my love? I...I need this. We need this.” She responds. The demon smiles at her, “I knew bombarding her with images of us mating would make this easier. I had no idea it would work this well.” “Soon, soon Yugito. Now is not the time.” He then embraces the woman of his dreams, his life, his love, Yugito Nii.

Now what?

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Naruto shrugged idly and stuffed the scroll into his pocket before going to the Hokage tower for a mission to help him relief some of his persistant boredom. The mission board, unfortunately, was pretty much empty save for a few courier missions to various countries allied with the Hidden Leaf.

"Man, really? The only one that actually seems worthwhile is the mission to Suna. Eh, what the heck, I think I'll go see Gaara." he said with his trademark foray grin.

After confirming the fact that the mission was a solo one, Naruto quickly packed his bag and exited the village without really telling anyone where he was going, save for Tsunade. She would literally break him in half if he left without her ok.

He had been traveling for about an hour until he came to a point where the lush forests and sprawling plains metamorphosised into seemingly endless desert. Naruto, not being totally stupid, made sure he had plenty of water and food for his trek. He was just about to take his first steps into the desert when a slight rumbling in his pocket caused him to stop.

"What the hell?" Naruto said confusedly as he dug the strange scroll he found earlier out of his pocket.

The scroll was trembling and releasing a golden aura. The blonde stared at it dumbly for a second before stashing it back in his pocket, heedless to the fact that the scroll would change his life.

"Yosh, let's go!" he said with grin as he began his journey across the blazing sands.

About an hour later, Naruto came upon a curious sight. It was an old man shuffling across the desert, alone.

"Oi, old man! Do you need any help?" he asked kindly as he caught up.

The old man blinked at him before giving him a toothless smile.

"No sonny, but you look like you could use some proper clothing. The maiden of the desert shows no mercy, after all." the old man said with a chuckle.

The blonde shinobi blinked confusedly, "Eh, what do you mean?"

The old man stopped and dug in his pack and withdrew a long brown desert cloak and a beige scarf, just like the ones he had seen the citizens of Suna wear to ward off to sand. The old man pushed the clothes at him.

"There ya go, sonny. These'll help ya a lot!"

Naruto grinned widely and slipped the cloak over head and draped the scarf lossy around his neck. Come to think of it, putting on the clothes felt... off somehow. As if he had done this many times before. But that couldn't be right; he had only been to Suna once before.

"Thanks old man! What do I owe you?" he asked, digging in his pockets for his frog wallet.

The old man merely chuckled and began wading into the sandy gusts of the desert.

"Just think of this as a gift..." he echoed mysteriously.

Naruto grinned and waved at the departing old man.

"Thanks again!"

A dark sounding chuckle echoed through the whipping winds.

"You are quite welcome, Lady Karura."

Naruto blinked in confusion; did that old man call him Lady Karura? That wasn't right, Karura was girl's name...

The blonde shrugged and continued on. He fixed his scarf around his head to keep the sand away from his face and eyes. As he trekked on, he began to feel very strange, as if he was uncomfortable with his own body. That feeling quickly passed however, only to be replaced by a prickly feeling not unlike when his arm fell asleep in the academy.

The blond shinobi fidgeted constantly, it was so itchy! He needed to find a shelter ASAP! Perhaps he had been bitten during his journey by some poisonous desert critter.

Just as he finished itching himself beneath the heavy desert cloak the old man had given him, he saw a large silhouette sheathed in the murky air. As he grew closer, the silhouette was revealed to be a strange temple styled in the likeness of what appeared to be the beast he fought all those years ago during the chunin exams, the Ichibi no Shukaku.

"Sweet kami, jackpot!" Naruto exclaimed, relief evident in his scratchy voice.

Not caring about the imposing structure of the temple, the kyuubi host ran inside. The air in the temple was still, totally free from the whipping sands outside. After lighting a few torches he found in the atrium, Naruto settled down around a hastily lit fire and took a huge swig of water. He shivered and fell onto his side staring weakly at the fire; something was definitely wrong with him.

He was dimly aware of the scroll he found freeing itself from his bag and rolling across the floor, still trembling and encased in that golden glow.

He crawled towards it when that prickling feeling from before immobilized him.

What was happening to him?
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The curse of the desert.

choices: He begins growing a pair of breasts.
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The first thing the blond felt through all the prickling was a heavy amount of irritation in his hair, or more specifically, his scalp. Naruto grimaced and, using a considerable effort, slowly sat up and tenderly unwrapped the thick brown scarf from around his head. His head like it was on fire.

As he freed his head from the confines of the scarf, the first thing he noticed was that his hair wasn't spiking up like it normally was. In fact, his hair felt super soft and completely unwilling to stand up. Any attempt to make it spike back up only made his hair lay flatter. He fingered one of his bangs and brought it in front of his frantic eyes and gasped when he saw that the color of his hair was... off.

Mixed in with his bright sunny blond hair were extremely prominent streaks of a darker color, a dirty blond color that was almost an identical shade to the swirling sands outside his shelter.

Reaching into his pack with trembling fingers, Naruto slowly withdrew a mirror that shinobi would have used to look around corners and raised it to his face. He inhaled sharply at what he saw. It was much worse than he thought.

Not only was his hair almost completely straight, a good portion of it had darkened to the sandy color he had seen on his bangs. Then, ever so slowly, the color began to spread and his hair began to gently creep down the sides of his head.

Naruto couldn't believe his yes. He could only stare in shock as his formerly spiky yellow locks steadily lengthened into smooth sandy colored tresses that stopped just short of his shoulders. And somehow, as his hair grew, his headband came undone and fell from his forehead and onto the cold stone floor with a clatter.

With a shuddering breath, Naruto brought his hand to his newly grown hair and nearly recoiled at how soft and silky smooth it was compared to his old hair. He would freely admit that he didn't even look like himself anymore. He looked, dare he say it, feminine.

"What the hell is this?" he whispered in disbelief.

Did this have to do with the kyuubi?

As if summoned by his thoughts, a deep voice reverberated from deep writhin his mind.

"NO."

If it wasn't the fox's doing, then what the hell was this!?

But before he could finish his thoughts he was beset by another wave of discomfort that bordered on pain.

What is happening?
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: His hair starts growing and changing?

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Naruto sat there, completely immobilized by the pricking discomfort that wracked his exhausted body. Though unlike before, this feeling felt restrained withing him, or rather, within his chest. The leaf shinobi gasped as something seemed to crack beneath his clothes, beneath his very skin. He slowly gripped the scarf and cloak and carefully slid them off his body, afraid that moving to fast could lead to something worse than what he was feeling now.

Once he was free of the desert wear, Naruto gulped and began slowly unzipping his bright orange jacket. The pressure that seemed to be building behind his chest was growing more unbearable by the minute. He shuddered invouluntarily and parted his jacket, revealing the fishnet shirt he wore underneath.

"Oh kami... what's happening to me?" he asked miserably, his newly grown hair lightly ticking his cheeks.

He watched in horror as his nipples seemed to perk up, the areaola darkening and widening considerably. The little nub in the center seemed to stick up and began to rub uncomfortably against his fishnet. Then the pressure behind his chest seemed to ooze beneath his engorged nipples.

He gasped as the flesh around them began to convulse and swell. The hard earned muscles in his pecs seemed to liquefy as his skin stretched to acomadate the swellings. Naruto watched in horror as what could only be a pair of breasts slowly bubbled up on his chest.

He placed his hands against them and, heedless to the extremely pleasant feeling he got from accidentally touching his nipples, tried to force his growing bosom back into his chest. This proved to be useless; it was as if someone had stuffed a water balloon under his flesh. The breasts seemed jiggle and squish around under his hands.

Despite his frantic pushing, Naruto's new breasts, now swollen with fat, reached a respectable C-cup in size.

The presence of breasts ON him made the kyuubi host realize something.

"Oh kami, I'm turning into a girl!"

"And finally does the last horse cross the finish line..." the deep, raspy voice of the kyuubi rumbled in his mind.

Naruto stilled and wrapped his arms around his new bosom as if to shield them from perverts.

"Kyuubi! This is your doing, I know it!" he growled.

The bijuu laughed madly at his accusation.

"Foolish little boy, I do believe that I have already told you that it was not I who brought this unique development down upon you."

"I don't believe you! Your trying to make my life more hellish than its already been!"

"How cute, but it is no one's fault but your own, boy. Perhaps you should look before touching."

"What the hell are you-! The scroll!" he gasped out.

"Oh? Perhaps you are not as dumb as you make yourself out to be, fleshbag."

Just as he was about to rush for the scroll in hopes to stop this madness, Naruto falls to his knees as his flesh begins to churn violently.

What happens next?

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Naruto couldn't help but cry out as his face began to bubble and contort in a way similar to his breasts. He shakily raised the mirror just in time to see someone else's features appearing on his face.

"N-no, this can't be happening to me!"

The monster in his mind only laughed at him, finding this whole situation highly amusing.

The thick black markings that tripled each cheek, the markings that identified him as the host of the kyuubi, slowly faded away to reveal only smooth, flawless skin. His bright blue eyes teared up a they grew larger and darkened to a warm chocolate brown, accompanied by the thinning out of his sandy colored eyebrows and the weight of his newly volumed lashes. His chapped lips quivered and plumped up into a feminine bow shape and his teeth, slightly sharpened by the kyuubi's influence, lost their point. Then his jawline and chin softened into a delicate shape and the bubbling and contortions ceased.

Naruto stared at his face in shock. He saw not the face of the famed kyuubi host, but the soft, kind-looking features of a young woman in her late twenties.

He slowly raised a hand and gently rested it on his cheek, marveling at the smoothness off his skin.

"Kami, who am I?" he whisprered softly.

He froze and rested his hand on his throat. That was definitely not his voice. The voice that came out of his mouth was a soft soprano, soothing and melodious.

"This is very interesting." the fox growled.

"W-what? Do you know something?"

"Judging by the fact that your chakra is vanishing and your foul human stench reeks of the host of the , I would have to guess that you are changing into someone of civilian relation to the one called Gaara, probably his mother if my guess is correct."

"Gaara's mom..." he breathed in his soft voice.

What happens next?
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The face of a desert angel.

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Naruto walking down the roads of the Hidden Leaf Village. He was extremely bored today. His sensei, Jiraiya, wouldn't be back for about 3 months or so to take him on a long training trip.

"Lousy old pervy sage. Probably peaking at women again or somethig" muttered the 13-year old. He had done a little training earlier and was done for the day, hence why he was so bored. He wished something interesting would happen. Little did he know that he would soon get said chance.

"Hmm?" he wondered as something caught his eye. It was an odd scroll laying around. It looked interesting to him so he picked it up and tried to open it. It had quite a lock on it.

"Urgh! Stupid lock! Open already!" yelled Naruto as he struggled to open the darned thing. Luckily (or perhaps unluckily), it eventually opened to him.

"Ha ha! That's more like it! Now, what do we have here?" asked Naruto as he trid to observe the characters on the scroll. However, in that insant, his fate was sealed as the scroll let out a ray of light and hit him square in the chest.

"Omph!" was the sound Naruto made as he landed on the ground, dazed by the brightness of the scroll and the light hitting him. After shaking his head, he got up and tried to find what hit him. However, he soon discovered that the scroll was gone!

"Huh? Where did it go? That was wierd" wonder Naruto. Certainly an odd way to spend the day in his opinion.

"Oh well, might as well get some ramen!" said Naruto, thinking about the one thing in the whole world that could make him happy no matter what.

Too bad he didn't notice at the time that his fate was sealed there. Soon enough, he would be filling someone else's shoes and help live the life that they were deprived of.
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The Story Begins Anew

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
As Naruto walked along towards his favorite raman stand, Ichiraku's, he couldn't help but feel this odd feeling throughout his body. It surprised him a bit. It didn't feel like the nine-tailed fox inside of him. No, it was more like....well, he couldn't really describe it.

"Oh well, best not to think about it" said Naruto, trying to get his mind of it. Little did he know the changes were already beginning to happen to him. The scroll was going to turn him into someone who had passed away long ago. It would someone his sensei, Kakashi Hatake, would be familiar with in particular.

Anyway, for the changes, it wasn't much as Naruto actually grew about an inch. The person he was becoming would be Rin, an old teammate of Kakashi who passed away in the previous war. Since Naruto was so short, he actually had to grow an inch to reach the height of the girl.

"Ah, there it is!" said Naruto as he found the raman shop he loved so much. Immediately, we went in and sat down, seeing the owner Teuchi and his daughter Ayame.

"Hi there!" yelled Naruto, getting the owner's attention. Teuchi turned around and gave a bright smile to the young boy who was his best customer.

"Well hello there Naruto! You here for the usual?" asked Teuchi.

"You bet!" said Naruto, obviously. The father and daughter duo got to work on Naruto's order. As they did, Ayame couldn't help but notice something off about Naruto. For one thing, something about him seemed....smaller. Like his overall frame was smaller. Despite his short height, Naruto was still a well fit male. Not only that, he seemed to be sitting on the seat with his hands in his lap, kind of like what the girls usually do.

"Hey Naruto, have you gotten...smaller?" asked Ayame. Naruto squinted at the girl in annoyance.

"Are you making cracks about my height again?" asked the boy. Naruto was always a little peeved when people made fun of his height. this made the ramen girl giggle.

"Actually, it wasn't. Although, now that I think about it, maybe you're even shorter than you were before" said Ayame, giggling more and annoying the boy.

"Grrr" growled Naruto, which didn't scare Ayame in the slightest. Naruto just ended up pouting and waited there patiently. However, he suddenly felt a draft go by and he suddenly found himself shivering slightly.

'Well, that's odd. How can I be even a little cold even with this wind?" thought Naruto. The reason why he felt this in such a way. Well, his skin had now also softened up, losing it's rough edges and any blemishes he happened to have. Any body hair he had, which wasn't much, also was wiped from his body and left smooth skin.

Too bad Naruto was too busy thinking of other things to notice any of this.
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The Ramen Stand

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
After the strange feeling disappeared, Naruto shook his head.

"Wow; what was that feeling?" he thought as he looked down. "I hope nothing strange..." he trailed off as he suddenly noticed something odd: He was wearing a pair of blue sandals!

Looking closer, Naruto also saw that he was wearing a blue and orange jacket with a white collar and orange pants with a shuriken holster. A strange light tightness around his head told him that he was also wearing a forehead protector. Although this was how Naruto normally looked, it now seemed to make him panic a bit.

Spotting a small lake nearby, Naruto hurried over to get a look at his reflection. When he did, he screamed in equal parts shock, anger and embarrasment.

What Naruto didn't know was that the scroll had made him think that his own clothes were really those of Kiba's dog, Akamaru. So, since he now thought that was wearing the clothes of a dog, he was understandably freaking out.

But what does he do next?

Does he hurry over to Kiba's house hoping to put the clotjes 'back' before it's noticed?
Or does he take the clothes off first, since he doesn't want to run through the village dressed as a dog?
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: A Strange Experience With Clothes...

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The tingling from the scroll became an intense jolt in his abdomen. The energy caused a change in his chakra core. "What the hell! What was that?" an irritated Naruto. Deciding that the Scroll wasn't worth the pain, Naruto decided to discard the scroll. He looked to see if he missed anything but all he saw were the words Human-Machine Conversion.

This cemented Naruto's decision, he didn't see the point in owning a scroll that wouldn't teach him a cool new jutsu.
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Yes

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content: Naruto felt a sharp pain in his arm. He found what looked to be a tattoo. It looked like a series of vertical bars with a series of numbers preceded by a letter. N012607. "What, were did this come from?" he yelled, "I going get the person who did this." Naruto decided to ignore it for now.
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Transformation Begins

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content: Naruto decided to enjoy some Ramen to forget about the scroll. Naruto called out to Teuchi "Old man, I want some Ramen." "I'll get your usual." As soon the bowl touched Naruto dug in as usual. However, half-way through his third bowl Naruto felt nauseous. "Old man, I gotta go." Naruto ran toward his apartment before Teuchi could stop him.
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: At Ichiraku Ramen

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Naruto barely made it to his apartment door when he threw up all of his meal. His body was rejecting the food.
Despite losing his lunch Naruto still felt energized as his Chakra was converted into a new power core. This would drive the rest of his transformation. Naruto was confused "What's happening? I threw up. Shouldn't I feel weak? Why don't I feel worse about the Ramen?"

He went into his apartment to look himself over. The skin on his right arm looked strange, and the symbol he saw earlier looked nothing like ink. He also saw some strange lines forming a circle around the space where his seal should be. Where is it? It can't be gone. Where did the fox go?, said a surprisingly calm Naruto. He decided to step back and think, when he spoke next his voice gained an electronic quality, "I have to think logically. ...Processing Data... I didn't see or feel the Fox escape, It should still be in my containment unit...Containment confirmed!"

Naruto regained his awareness and his voice returned to normal. His panic returned, "Wait was that? Containment? That wasn't me! I need to see Granny"
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: At his apartment.

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Tsunade began her examination after Naruto explained his situation. "The skin on your arm looks very strange. at a glance it looks similar to your own, but after a closer look it lacks its usual texture. I'm not sure, but I'd say it looks synthetic. " "What does that mean?", asked a concerned Naruto. Tsunade was at a loss, she had no clue. "I'm not sure. I'll check your Chakra Core next."

Tsunade began using the Mystical Palm Technique to scan his abdomen, she pondered, "strange why is it pulsing like that?" Seconds later she shouted in alarm, "What the hell?" Granny, "what is it?" Naruto was worried. "Your Chakra has been altered to drive the transformation of your body. The mark on your arm looks like a Barcode with an I.D. Number. Your Chakra, or rather what was your Chakra Core looks like some kind of advanced power core beyond any thing I've ever seen."

"Granny, What's happening to me? Can you fix me? I don't want to Transform into something I'm not?," He kept yelling at Tsunade. She had enough, "Naruto, I'm your Hokage! Show me some respect." As if possessed, Naruto's posture shifted and his voice changed. Order Acknowledged, standing down.

"Naruto?" called out Tsunade. His blank look reminded her too much of Danzo's shinobi. Thankfully the trance lifted. Naruto was absolutely terrified. His look made her feel helpless. She tried to comfort him, "Naruto, no matter what happens. I'll do everything I can to make sure that you stay you."

Tsunade would make sure her ANBU retrieved that scroll to help Naruto.
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Tsunade Examines Him

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
After Tsunade left, Naruto was left to ponder his situation. He didn't know what to do. His biggest fear was losing who he was. Would he lose his friends? Would he lose everything he fought for? Could he still use Jutsu? Before he could figure it out, the door to his room opened.

It was Team 7. He quickly covered himself hide the most obvious change. "Kakashi-sensei, Sakura, what are you doing here?"
Visiting you idiot. We've already lost Sasuke. I'm not going to lose you too. What did you do this time anyway? Kakashi interjected, "Now don't be too hard on him. He'll be fine." Naruto felt better after their visit. "Thanks, guys."

Tsunade returned and chased them out. Naruto no longer felt the need to cover his upper body. His power core was revealed to someone he didn't expect. He heard a gasp, "Naruto-kun..., "Um, Tsunade-sama, what's happening to Naruto-kun?" Naruto complained, "Why did you bring Hinata? I didn't want anyone to see me like this." "Quite Brat, she's here to help." Once again he complied with an order.

"Hinata, his body is changing into some kind of machine. I need your Byakugan." She activated her ability to help her Naruto. Hinata, nearly fainted at what she saw. His abdomen was fully mechanical, pulsing with energy, spreading slowly through nodes which had replaced his Chakra points. She shed some tears upon the discovery. "Naruto-kun's body entire Chakra Network has completely changed. "

Naruto was hyperventilating. He had the sinking feeling that nothing would stop this. This had the unfortunate side of effect of increasing energy flow. Naruto gasped as his chest felt hot. He found that he no longer felt dizzy because he no longer needed to breath. He looked to Hinata to confim his fear. Hinata confirmed his lungs and heart had changed into a heat exchange system and what appeared to be a primary power node.

Despite her fear she promised to help him, though she suspected one of her desires was now out of reach.
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Visitors Arrive

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Naruto was afraid, but he couldn't afford to freak out or he would risk accelerating the changes. He decided to ask Hinata, why she would help him after a pause and a blush told him. "Naruto-kun, years ago you tried to save me from bullies. I'm admired you ever since. " Naruto eyes burned but no tears came. "Hinata, I'm sorry I forgot you. I'd be crying right now, but even that's gone now." His eyes had changed too. Hinata observed to her disappointment that they lost some of their vibrancy.

Hinata decided to cry for him. She told him, "I'll be here." When she cleared her eyes she noticed his skin finished changing. She saw lines around his joints, something what she assumed were seems to cover hidden components. Her Byakugan would reveal that it covered his now metal frame. His face also lost it's whiskers marks.

She grew concerned when he clutched his head. His skull and brain changed last. When she heard his voice, she knew the changes were finished. "Hinata, I don't feel human anymore." "Naruto, I'd join you if could make you feel better." "No, don't throw your life away. "

A jolt went through Naruto's new brain. It started to shut down to reprogram itself. ...Hinata...stay true...yourself...Don'f know...much left...of me...tomorrow. She yelled out, Naruto-kun!, to no avail.

Tsunade returned to find a sobbing Hinata. "Tsunade-sama, what do we do now?"
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Naruto's Physical Changes Finish.

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The assembled teams and sensei's arrived. The first thing they noticed was an emotional Hinata, followed by Naruto lying in a bed, They began to shout, Tsunade-sama, why are we here? Why is Hinata crying? What happened to Naruto? Silence! Shut up and I'll explain, Naruto found a scroll that began transforming him. He's no longer human. He's some kind of machine.

The broke into more shouts. Kakashi felt like he failed Minato. Sakura was in tears. The rest felt conflicted.

The atmosphere changed when an ANBU arrived. "Tsunade, we retrieved the scroll." The scroll was placed in an insulted container to prevent any potential electric discharge from affecting anyone.

"This is the cause. It is forbidden to touch it. Only an authorized individual can access it."
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Tsunade informs Naruto's Friend's

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content: "I won't leave him on his own", said Hinata lunged for the scroll to every ones horror. Her team shouted for her to stop, but she had channeled a substantial amount of Chakra into the scroll. Her transformation went much faster than Naruto because she intentionally channeled all her Chakra. She would shutdown momentarily. ...Sensei...I'm sorry...Naruto...alone...too long.

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
H-012612 asked N-012067, "There seems to be an Error in my personality core. Did your system detect any anomalies?
Affirmative, Anomaly detected in Personality core.

As the robots communicated, their friends were distressed, Naruto and Hinata didn't sound like themselves at all. Although they hoped correcting this "personality core" could make them more human.

"Naruto and Hinata", called out Tsunade to no avail. Although it hurt, she decided to use their Unit Designation. "N-012067, H-012612 respond". "Acknowledged". Their blank stares unnerved her. Seeing their acceptance of orders made her feel like Danzo, but it gave her an idea.
N-012067 you will answer to Naruto, H-012612 you will answer to Hinata. "Acknowledged, name accepted."

Tsunade was relieved to use their names. Now she needed to know what they were capable of. Let's meet with your senseis to see what you can do. She was pleasantly suprised when they requested to stay with each other. Maybe their was some hope.

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
-At the training field-

Naruto we set up a course for you, show us what you can do. Affirmative, Weapon Systems Online. He reached out with his right palm forward and released an energy blast that put a hole clean through the wooden post.

Try a using the Rasengan. The energy swirled in his palm creating a version of the Fourth Hokage's jutsu. One of the training posts was severed. Tsunade was satisfied.

Next she wanted to see his taijutsu. What used to be sloppy, was smooth and fluid. Also his body's composition gave him more mass. When his strikes hit the target ii splintered into pieces.

He was an efficient machine throughout each one of her tests.

Tsunade noted that Hinata was watching intensely and thought she saw a flicker of emotion pass through Hinata's eyes. This gave her an idea. She asked Kakashi, "do you see what I did?" "Yes, Hinata seemed to react to him. Maybe a memory?" he guessed. "I want you to attack Naruto in his blind spot." This confused Kakashi, "What?" Trust me. Make her believe he's in danger. His kunai flew at Naruto. When Naruto moved to intercept the explosive note detonated.

They knew It had the intended effect when they heard a familiar, "Naruto-kun"
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Hinata's Personality Returns

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Tsunade was proud of herself for discovering a way to restore Hinata's personality. Team 8 gathered around Hinata. An emotional Kurenai ranted, "Why? Why did you do it? Sacrificing your Humanity like that? Your clan won't accept you now?" "I apologize for distressing you, but I felt like I had to. Naruto-kun has been alone for too long. I didn't want him to suffer anymore." The onlookers were impressed by her passionate argument. They also felt shame, that they didn't reach out to Naruto to ease his loneliness.

Hinata, can you do anything for Naruto? Tsunade hoped the Naruto they knew would return. "I need access to your system."

Hinata accessed a panel on the back of his neck to initiate repair.

DEBUG [[C:][CPU]personalitycore [restore]] Authorization Code_Gynoid H-012612 **********

N-012067 ...Command Accepted...

To everyone's relief Naruto responds as they hoped. "I'm back."
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Hinata Restores Naruto

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Hinata, why?" "I told you why. I care about you Naruto-kun. I came to love you. I did this because I wanted to be with you, no matter what form you or I take. I don't regret this."

"Hinata. I never knew. I was so hung up on Sakura. Now, we'll never know. I still disagree with what you did."

"Naruto I analyzed your system error. Without me your code could not be fixed. You would have been lost."Naruto, please do not dwell on this. Let us make the best of this."

Having restored his mood Naruto shouted, "You're right Hinata we'll be the best, and only, Androids ever"
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Naruto talks to Hinata

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content: Naruto turns into Little Girl
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Little Girl

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Naruto awoke in a hospital bed. He opened his eyes and everything felt so much bigger. He sat up on the side of the bed and was surprised at the distance between him and the floor. Tiny feet, like those of a child, dangled of the edge. Naruto was freaking out, he had to see what happened to him. He reached the mirror and saw an 8 year old child. His hair was still blond, but it was tied into two pigtails. He had two large blue eyes. He had a round, cute face with no whiskers, and cute nose. He looked like a girl. He checked to confirm it and found he really was a little girl.

Eeek!, She shrieked releasing a definitely girlish scream. Tears began flowing out of her eyes, she didn't want to be girl. The nurse rushed to her side and pulled her into a hug letting her cry. "It's okay you'll be fine." Naruto responded like a child comforted by her parents, she felt warm inside and relaxed, and eventually fell asleep again.

Naruto woke hearing voices, "Tsunade-sama, she acted just like a child. I'd be careful with her. We don't know how much has changed." She sat and wiped her eyes. Naruto's face lit up when she saw Tsunade, "Granny you came to see me." "Yes, I want to ask you a few questions." How are you feeling? She whined, "Granny, I'm bored when can I go." "When you answer my questions", an exasperated Tsunade told her. "Do you remember anything from yesterday?" Naruto giggled and said, "Yeah, I remember a scroll. It went boom." What about your Chakra? "I haven't tried use my fuzzy feeling thingy." Tsunade was concerned, Naruto had the attention and comprehension of a child.

The nurse suggested she take Naruto home because she had daughter of her own. Tsunade approved not knowing what else to do.
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Girly Girl

1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Shiroko the nurse, carried a pouting Naruto toward her home. Naruto was upset that she was forced to wear an over sized shirt. Shiroko picked her up to avoid a prolonged argument. "Are we there yet?" asked Naruto. Shiroko having experienced this before decided to ignore Naruto.

They arrived at the house minutes after. An excited girl yelled, "Mommy, your home." "Yuki. I brought someone with me. Please be good to her, she needs our help." "Naruto greeted her, I'm Naruto, let's be friends." Yuki frowned, "that's sounds like a boy's name. I'll call you Naruko." Naruko agreed, "Okay." Yuki's frown turned into a smile and she grabbed Naruko. "Let's get you into something prettier you look like a boy." Being a girl was growing on Naruko, and the shirt was uncomfortable.

The two girls spend the afternoon playing dress-up, braiding hair and with Yuki showed Naruko her dolls. When the adults came they were giggling. Tsunade was surprised to see Naruko in a white sundress with flower and playing with doll. "Naruko, what are you doing?" "Playing with Yuki." "We are trying to get you back to normal." Naruko questioned, "Why would I go back to being a gross boy? I want to wear pretty dresses and play with dolls. Besides Ninja are mean. Why does anyone have to fight?"

Tsunade was struggling to maintain composure. She couldn't believe that Naruko had become a girly girl that hated ninja related things.
1453222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Nurses Daughter
